Basic understanding of video games as a player, enthusiast, or industry observer.
Business Executives that wish to take their studio or skills in gaming to the Next- Level
courses.description:
A self-paced, 6-course masterclass that cuts through the noise, guiding you through the real-world game development journey—asking the right questions at every stage, from concept to creation, launch, and scaling a studio that attracts investors.
This course comes packed with Pro Toolkits  (more learning materials) and XP Quests (assignments) designed to level your skills. Each module is a thinking, self-assessment of one's business with real-world strategies that include interactive elements, case studies, tools and templates, videos, real-world case studies, and hands-on challenges to help you create blockbuster games that captivate players and take your studio to the next level with investors.
Welcome:
1. Module: Validate Your Game and Studio Place in the Gaming Industry For Success
Building your studio's foundation – creating a strong identity
DEFINE YOUR VISION AND BRING GAMES TO LIFE
Why: A new game studio must define and uphold its core mission to differentiate itself. This question ensures that every decision—game mechanics, marketing, monetization—reinforces the studio's identity.
Practical Use:
A newly formed studio that wants to specialize in a genre, platform, or monetization strategy ﻿might consider identifying the Purpose of Gameplay and its audience of users. Before doing so, they must ask:
Does integrating features or game mechanics enhance our storytelling experience, or is it just a gimmick?
Does this align with our vision of immersive role-playing games?
Lesson: A strong brand identity keeps the studio from pursuing trends that dilute its purpose.
Every successful game studio begins with a visionary spark of creativity that inspires a team to bring a unique game to life. But creativity alone doesn't guarantee success. In an increasingly competitive game industry, which generated over $220 billion in revenue in 2023, a strong foundation built on business acumen, strategic planning, and market awareness is essential for thriving.


2. Module: Game Business Entrepreneurship
Game Studio Growth Blueprint: From Startup to Scale


Why: Many early-stage studios fail because they don't focus on the correct problems at the right time. This module teaches founders to use structured frameworks—from MVP testing to platform selection—to validate ideas before investing resources.
Practical Use:
A team decides to develop a multiplayer survival game but asks:
Should we focus on adding more weapons first, or do players care more about smoother matchmaking?
Should we optimize our graphics engine now or test the game loop first?
Lesson: Successful studios focus on the proper milestones—prioritizing game viability, engagement, and retention over non-essential polish early on.
By the end, participants will have actionable strategies for aligning development with business strategies, building financially sound studios, and positioning projects for success in the competitive gaming landscape.


3. Module: Finance and Business Strategy
Mastering Budgets and Financials – Fueling Sustainable Growth
Why: Financial mistakes can kill a studio before its first game launches. This question ensures developers consult investors, accountants, and publishers before making significant financial commitments.
Practical Use:
Before committing to self-publishing, a studio should ask:
Have we spoken to publishers to compare revenue-sharing deals?
Have we consulted investors on our burn rate and runway?
What do successful studios say about managing cash flow in early development?
Lesson: Seeking expert financial advice early prevents costly mistakes like over-hiring, underfunding, or overextending on unnecessary features.


What you will take away is mastering budgets and financials as the backbone of any successful game studio. Without a well-structured financial plan, even the most innovative and well-designed games can fail due to poor resource management, funding shortages, or unexpected costs. This module ensures that your studio has the financial stability and strategic foresight to sustain long-term growth while navigating the unpredictable nature of game development.


4. Module: Marketing and Growth Strategies
Marketing Mastery – Launch Strategies That Go Viral
Why: Financial mistakes can kill a studio before its first game launches. This question ensures developers consult investors, accountants, and publishers before making significant financial commitments.
Practical Use:
Before committing to self-publishing, a studio should ask:
Have we spoken to publishers to compare revenue-sharing deals?
Have we consulted investors on our burn rate and runway?
What do successful studios say about managing cash flow in early development?
Lesson: Seeking expert financial advice early prevents costly mistakes like over-hiring, underfunding, or overextending on unnecessary features.
This pivotal module explores the essential strategies for launching your game and turning it into a viral sensation. In today's crowded gaming market, simply creating a great game isn't enough—you need to know how to promote it effectively, reach the right audience, and maintain long-term momentum. This module provides the proven tools and techniques to elevate your game's visibility and ensure it stands out in a competitive market.


5. Module: Business Expansion and Operations
Scaling for Success – Expanding Your Studio's Reach and Capabilities
Why: Scaling a studio requires constant iteration. Many games launch with too many features, overwhelming players, or lack critical elements that boost engagement. This question forces teams to focus on high-impact improvements.
Practical Use:
A live-service game struggling with player retention asks:
Would simplifying crafting make the experience more engaging?
Should we remove complex UI elements that confuse new players?
Would adding a social feature like guilds increase daily logins?
Lesson: The most successful studios listen to players and iterate on what truly enhances engagement and retention.
In this critical module, we'll explore how to expand your game studio's reach and scale its capabilities to meet the demands of today's market and set the stage for long-term success. Building scalable systems, optimizing operations, and implementing leadership strategies that can handle more extensive projects, bigger teams, and increased complexity are essential as your studio grows.


6. Module: Leadership and Future Strategy
Strategic vision – creating value and preparing for the future
Why: Many studios start strong but fail to scale. This question is posed throughout the business stages and ensures long-term planning for new technologies, content pipelines, and business models.
Practical Use:
A studio expanding to live-service games asks:
Can we sustain regular content updates without crunch?
Are we building scalable tech that won't need a costly overhaul in a year?
Will our monetization model hold up as our player base grows?
Lesson: Strategic foresight ensures a game studio remains competitive, adaptable, and financially viable long-term.
Welcome to Module 6! This forward-thinking module delves into the importance of creating a strategic vision that positions your game studio for long-term success and helps future-proof your business in an ever-evolving industry. As technology advances, it's crucial to leverage emerging technologies such as AI, blockchain, and VR/AR to drive innovation, enhance gameplay, and create new revenue streams.
Conclusion:
Thank You for Taking the First Step Toward Building Your Blockbuster Game Empire
First, thank you for taking this vital step in securing your place in the gaming industry. Putting your creativity on the line for player acceptance takes persistence, vision, and courage. By completing this course, you've gained the foundational business strategies that transform a game into a blockbuster tentpole franchise with long-term success for your studio empire.
target_audience: Anyone Passionate About the Business of Games – If you want to turn your game idea into a blockbuster franchise, this course gives you the roadmap.

Aspiring Game Publishers & Entrepreneurs – Those who want to launch a game business but don’t know where to start.udents looking to get into the video game industry and start their own indie game studio.
Indie Developers & Studio Founders – Creators with a game idea who need funding, publishing, and marketing strategies to succeed.
Investors & Business Professionals – People looking to understand how to invest in, publish, or monetize games for long-term success.

I’m excited to help you become the candidate who gets hired. Let’s get started and make your next interview a success!

We'll start by demystifying these innovative machines, answering big questions like:
What exactly are hybrid and electric vehicles? And what makes them so much better for your wallet and the planet?
How do they achieve their impressive fuel efficiency? We'll uncover the clever science behind it!
What cutting-edge work goes on behind the scenes in the auto industry to design these vehicles?
Where does a car typically lose energy, and what brilliant solutions do engineers use to minimize waste and maximize efficiency in HEVs?
You'll also get an exclusive peek into how automotive systems are modeled and optimized. We'll introduce you to the "brain" of a hybrid – the supervisory controller – and show you how it's implemented to make these vehicles so smart.
This course is perfect for anyone curious about the future of automotive industry, especially if you're thinking about a career in hybrid and electric vehicle design and development. You'll gain a solid understanding of the essential activities performed in the industry to create today's most fuel-efficient cars, including hybrids, plug-in hybrids, and pure electric vehicles.
No prior experience in automotive or engineering is needed! This is a beginner-friendly course, designed to be easy to follow for everyone. Get ready to explore the fascinating world of sustainable driving!

For individuals who want to venture into zero operating emission automobiles and want to understand what the industry invests there efforts in
Automotive engineers willing to contribute in reversing rapid climate change by working on high fuel economy based solutions

courses.title: Agritourism and Rural Development
courses.bio: Agritourism and Rural Development

The Role of Agritourism in Sustainable D: The Role of Agritourism in Sustainable Development
The Role of Agritourism in Sustainable Development

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
Agritourism continues to be an opportunity to increase income for some farmers and agribusinesses around the nation. Some producer organizations, state and federal government agencies, university Extension programs, state tourism offices, professional consultants, and the media are recognizing agritourism as an industry and devoting resources to address it . One estimate suggests approximately 20 million children under the age of 16 also visited farms during the year, making the total number of visitors to farms approximately 82 million.
The United States Department of Agriculture (USDA) estimates that more than 62 million people aged 16 years and older visited farms during a one-year period in 2000 and 2001. This does not count the numerous children and youth under 16 years of age who visited farms during this time period.
The USDA also investigated the reasons people made trips to farms. Responses included:
Ø Enjoy the rural scenery
Ø Learning where food comes from
Ø Visit family or friends.
Ø Watch or participate in farm activities
Ø Purchase agricultural products.
Ø Pick fruit or produce.
Ø Hunt or fish
Ø Spend a night
In Italy, an agritourism law was passed in 1985 to regulate and encourage Italian farm stays. There are three types of agriturismo classifications in Italy: one that provides light meals or self-service snacks; one that offers full-service meals; and one that provides farm holidays that include meals, housing, and other activities. In Italy, agriturismo farmers are also allowed to sell value-added farm products including locally produced wines, olive oils, pasta, prepared meats, cheeses, jellies and jams, honey, baked goods, and crafts.
Estimates place today’s number of agriturismo locations in Italy between 9,000 and 20,000, and their success has led many other European Union countries to enact similar national policies to help increase farm income and create jobs in rural communities.
target_audience: All levels

courses.description:
The percentages say few make it as traders, but unlike the NBA, which requires freak athletic ability or something beyond your control, or becoming a doctor, which requires a high IQ, hundreds of thousands of dollars and a lot of time, successfully trading the market is realistically within your grasp.
In this mini masterclass, Jason Leavitt teaches trading. It’s part art and part science; it’s part mechanical and part intuitive. With a delicate blend of both, you can successfully navigate the market and make a solid income, full time or part time.
It's not easy, but it can be simplified. And it's closer to your grasp than you think.
Trading is a performance activity. It's hard if you consider everything, but it's doable because you have the ability to clearly identify something that works and something the clicks with your personality. You can then practice and get very good. If you are terrible at 99% of what's out there but are very good at just one thing, you can make a solid living.
This is a foundations course. Underlying theory is taught - the rules are the same as with business, sports and gambling. A discussion follows about where alpha comes from – trading is not a numbers game. Overall market analysis and stock selection follow.
If you’re new, this course is a great way to get started – it’ll put you on the right track and shorten your learning curve. If you’ve traded for a while but can’t seem to get over the hump, this course can get you there.
target_audience: Beginner traders looking to shorten their learning curve and get started on the right track.
Intermediate traders who can't quite seem to get over the hump.

courses.description:
This mini course is designed to detail the new Artificial Intelligence (AI) features that Keap is building and integrating into the software so that you can take full advantage of your monthly Keap subscription.
AI is a powerful resource for small businesses, and these features will help you launch more automations more quickly, and communicate with your audience more effectively.
This course is under an hour in total, and starts by introducing the AI Automation Assistant, which is  a tool that uses details about your business (target customers, product/service offerings, etc) and produces the copy you need to launch automation plays that can produce results for your business.
Once we have the copy, then we'll dig into how you can use that content in an Automation you build inside of Keap. Copy is often a stumbling block for launching new marketing plays, but with the copy written for us things go much more smoothly. We'll walk through the process of building and launching that play.
And finally, we'll introduce "the wand", another AI tool Keap offers that can help you with one-off individual communications as you (and your sales team) are interacting with leads and prospects.
These tools can be huge time savers, and create meaningful results for your business.
But only if you know how to use them...right?
target_audience: Keap Users
Small Business Owners
Entrepreneurs

courses.title: How to Be GRANT READY: A Free Course for U.S. Nonprofits
courses.bio: Grant Readiness Made Simple for U.S. Nonprofits: Get Organized, Get Funded
requirements: Staff, board member or volunteer for "grant eligible" charities, schools, government agencies & hospitals
Adobe Acrobat Reader (to view checklist PDFs)
courses.description:
Would you rather spend 100 hours writing a grant—or just 4 hours?
When I started writing grants, it took me over 100 hours to complete my first proposal, which secured $125,000 in funding. But years later, I finished my 52nd proposal—a $420,000 grant—in only 4 hours!
How did I do it?
I learned how to be Grant Ready.
What Does It Mean to Be Grant Ready?
Most funders—whether foundations, corporations, or government agencies—ask for the same key documents. But many nonprofits scramble at the last minute to find them, losing valuable time and missing out on funding.
This free course teaches you how to get your nonprofit organized ahead of time so you can apply for grants quickly and successfully.
What You’ll Learn
To get funding, your nonprofit must be prepared to show that it is:
Well-Managed (Governance Documents: Board list, bylaws, reports)
Financially Responsible (Budgets, IRS Form 990, audits)
Legally Compliant (IRS nonprofit determination letter, incorporation papers)
Mission-Driven (Programs, impact data, team qualifications)
These documents should be stored in an easy-to-use system—both in a 3-ring binder and in the cloud—so your team can quickly access them whenever a funding opportunity arises.
This Course Supports GPCI Competency 02
This course aligns with Grant Professionals Certification Institute (GPCI) Competency 02, which focuses on organizational development as it relates to grant seeking. Understanding how to assess and improve your nonprofit’s grant readiness is a key part of successfully securing funding.
If you're working toward becoming Grant Professional Certified (GPC), this course provides essential knowledge on how to:
Evaluate your nonprofit’s capacity to apply for and manage grants
Implement best practices for grant readiness
Align funding opportunities with your organization’s mission and strategic goals
GPC certification is the gold standard in the grants profession. By taking this course, you’ll gain fundamental skills that support your journey toward certification and make your grant applications stronger and more competitive.
How This Course Helps You Win More Grants
By the end of this course, you’ll have:
A step-by-step system to get your nonprofit ready for grants
6 checklists covering all key areas of grant readiness
A binder and cloud-based system to organize essential documents
The confidence to apply for grants faster and with less stress
Whether your nonprofit needs $400, $4,000, or $400,000, this Grant Readiness System works!
Stop scrambling. Start winning grants.
Enroll for free today!
target_audience: Beginning grant writers (paid or volunteer)
Freelance writers looking to add grant proposal writing to their skillset
Staff, administrators, board members, and volunteers with "grant eligible" charities, schools, government agencies & hospitals

courses.description:
Course Title: Poker Mindset Mastery – Win the Mental Game
Success in poker isn’t just about strategy and math — it’s about mindset. This course is designed to give players the psychological edge needed to consistently perform at their best, regardless of the cards. You'll learn how to master emotional control, avoid tilt, and make clear, rational decisions under pressure. Through practical techniques drawn from sports psychology, mindfulness, and behavioral science, you’ll build the mental toughness that separates amateurs from professionals.
Key topics include handling variance and downswings, maintaining focus during long sessions, cultivating discipline, and developing unshakable confidence. You'll also explore how to manage your energy, stay present in each hand, and use mental routines to prepare for both online and live play.
By understanding the mental side of poker, you’ll not only protect your bankroll from impulsive decisions but also gain a long-term competitive advantage. Whether you're a casual player looking to level up or a serious grinder aiming for peak performance, this course will help you think clearly, stay calm, and win more consistently. Poker is a mental game — and this course will train your mind to win it.
This works in every sport or Goal that you have!
target_audience: This is for beginner pokerplayers but also for poker players that feel stuck in the same results.

courses.title: برنامج مقدم الخدمات البيئية المحترف في المنشأت الصحية
courses.bio: برنامج مقدم الخدمات البيئيةالمحترف في المنشأت الصحية
objectives: مكافحة العدوى: إتقان أساسيات الوقاية من العدوى ، بما في ذلك طرق انتقال العدوى وبروتوكولات التنظيف والتعقيم واستخدام معدات الوقاية الشخصية
التنظيف البيئي: تعلم أفضل الممارسات لإجراءات التنظيف الفعالة في مختلف البيئات الرعاية الصحية ، بدءًا من إعداد العربة المناسب وتشغيل المعدات إلى بروتوكولات التنظ
عمليات غسيل الملابس والبياضات: اكتسب نظرة ثاقبة على أنواع الأقمشة المختلفة ، وسير عمل عملية الغسيل ، واختيار المنظف المناسب ، ومسؤوليات أفراد الغسيل.
الصحة والسلامة: فهم ممارسات السلامة الأساسية في المرافق الصحية ، بما في ذلك رموز الطوارئ ، والتعامل مع انسكاب المواد الكيميائية ، وإدارة النفايات الخطرة بيولوجي
requirements: لا توجد متطلبات مسبقة محددة لهذه الدورة. ومع ذلك ، فإن الفهم الأساسي للبيئات الرعاية الصحية والرغبة في التعلم مفيدان.
courses.description:
برنامج مقدم الخدمات البيئيةالمحترف في المنشأت الصحية
مقدمة عن البرنامج:
مرحباً بكم في هذه الدورة الشاملة المصممة لإعدادكم لمهنة ناجحة في مجال خدمات البيئة الصحية  ستزودكم هذه الدورة بالمعرفة والمهارات اللازمة للتفوق في الحفاظ على بيئة نظيفة وآمنة وصحية للمرضى والموظفين في المرافق الصحية.
ما الذي ستتعلمه:
مكافحة العدوى: إتقان أساسيات الوقاية من العدوى ، بما في ذلك طرق انتقال العدوى وبروتوكولات التنظيف والتعقيم واستخدام معدات الوقاية الشخصية (PPE).
التنظيف البيئي: تعلم أفضل الممارسات لإجراءات التنظيف الفعالة في مختلف البيئات الرعاية الصحية ، بدءًا من إعداد العربة المناسب وتشغيل المعدات إلى بروتوكولات التنظيف عند خروج المرضى.
عمليات المغسلة: اكتسب نظرة ثاقبة على أنواع الأقمشة المختلفة ، وسير عمل عملية الغسيل ، واختيار المنظف المناسب ، ومسؤوليات أفراد الغسيل.
السالمة والصحة المهنية: فهم ممارسات السلامة الأساسية في المرافق الصحية ، بما في ذلك رموز الطوارئ ، والتعامل مع انسكاب المواد الكيميائية ، وإدارة النفايات الخطرة بيولوجيًا ، وإجراءات السلامة من الحرائق ، وقراءة نشرات بيانات السلامة (SDS).
لمن هذه الدورة؟
هذه الدورة مثالية لـ:
الأفراد الذين يسعون إلى مهنة في خدمات البيئة الصحية
فنيون خدمات البيئة الصحية الحاليين الذين يرغبون في تحسين معارفهم ومهاراتهم
عمال الخدمات المنزلية الذين ينتقلون إلى بيئات الرعاية الصحية
أي شخص مهتم بالوقاية من العدوى والحفاظ على بيئة نظيفة
المتطلبات الأساسية:
لا توجد متطلبات مسبقة محددة لهذه الدورة. ومع ذلك ، فإن الفهم الأساسي للبيئات الرعاية الصحية والرغبة في التعلم مفيدان.
المناهج الدراسية:
تنقسم الدورة إلى أربعة أقسام رئيسية ، تحتوي كل منها على وحدات مُركّزة:
القسم أ: ممارسات مكافحة العدوى لخدمات البيئة الصحية (EVS)
الدرس الأول: سلسلة انتقال العدوى
الدرس الثاني: الاختلافات بين التنظيف والتطهير والتعقيم
الدرس الثالث: النظافة الشخصية لعمال خدمات البيئة الصحية
الدرس الرابع: بروتوكول نظافة اليدين
الدرس الخامس: مهمات الوقاية الشخصية
الدرس السادس: إصابات الوخز بالإبرة
الدرس السابع: إجراءات تنظيف الانسكابات البيولوجية
الدرس الثامن: رموز ألوان التنظيف
القسم ب: ممارسات التنظيف البيئي
الدرس الأول: خطوات بداية الوردية للعاملين في خدمات البيئة الصحية
الدرس الثاني: إعداد عربة التنظيف
الدرس الثالث: معرفة معدات التنظيف - المكانسة الكهربائية
الدرس الرابع: معرفة معدات التنظيف - آلة جلي الأرضيات
الدرس الخامس: إجراءات تنظيف غرفة المرضى عند خروج المريض / الوفاة
القالقسم ج: عمليات غسيل الملابس والبياضات لخدمات البيئة الصحية

الدرس السابع: واجبات عمال الغسيل
القسم د: ممارسات الصحة والسلامة لخدمات البيئة الصحية (EVS)
الدرس الأول: رموز الطوارئ في الرعاية الصحية

target_audience: الأفراد الذين يسعون إلى مهنة في خدمات البيئة الصحية
فنيون خدمات البيئة الصحية الحاليين الذين يرغبون في تحسين معارفهم ومهاراتهم

Design and implement an Anti-Bribery Management System (ABMS)
Conduct external and third-party audits for certification

Course Introduction: What Do You Expect of Your Course?

How to Apply and Choose the Risk Treatment?

requirements: - Basic understanding of corporate governance and ethics.
- Familiarity with business processes and risk management.
courses.description:
ISO 37001: Strengthening Anti-Bribery Management Systems
ISO 37001 is an internationally recognized standard designed to help organizations implement and maintain an Anti-Bribery Management System (ABMS). It provides a structured approach to identifying, preventing, detecting, and responding to bribery risks in both public and private sector organizations. The standard covers key elements such as leadership commitment, risk assessment, due diligence, training, and continuous monitoring. By adopting ISO 37001, businesses can establish a culture of integrity and compliance, ensuring that their operations align with anti-bribery laws and ethical best practices. Certification to this standard serves as a strong defense against corruption, helping organizations demonstrate their commitment to ethical business conduct.
The Impact of Bribery on Businesses
Bribery is a major challenge that erodes trust, distorts markets, and increases business risks. When organizations engage in or tolerate bribery, they expose themselves to legal penalties, reputational damage, and financial losses. Many countries have strict anti-bribery laws, such as the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (FCPA) and the UK Bribery Act, which impose severe consequences on companies and individuals involved in corrupt practices. Implementing robust anti-bribery policies, supported by ISO 37001, helps businesses prevent unethical transactions, ensuring compliance with legal frameworks while fostering fair competition and sustainable growth.
Building an Anti-Corruption Culture in Businesses
A strong anti-corruption culture is critical for businesses seeking long-term success and credibility. This requires clear policies, employee training, ethical leadership, and transparent processes to prevent corrupt practices at all levels of the organization. Encouraging whistleblowing mechanisms, conducting thorough due diligence on third parties, and continuously assessing bribery risks are essential strategies for maintaining integrity. Organizations that prioritize anti-corruption measures not only reduce financial and legal risks but also enhance their reputation and gain the trust of customers, investors, and regulatory authorities. In today's global business environment, ethical governance and compliance with standards like ISO 37001 are key differentiators for responsible and sustainable enterprises.
target_audience: Law Enforcement Officers
ISO Consultants & Implementers
Internal & External Auditors
Risk Managers
Compliance Officers
Banking & Finance Professionals
Supply Chain & Procurement Managers
Businesses aiming for ISO 37001 Certification

courses.title: Comprehensive Clinical Research and Pharmacovigilance
courses.bio: Master the Art of Clinical Research: From Drug Discovery to Regulatory Guidelines
objectives: Drug discovery and development stages.
Global regulatory standards, including ICH and GCP.
Managing adverse drug reactions and pharmacovigilance.
Clinical research project management and outsourcing.
Conducting and analyzing bioequivalence studies.
Communication skills essential for clinical research teams.

Pharmacovigilance: introduction to clinical trail design and biostats

requirements: Basic knowledge of biology, chemistry, or healthcare concepts. Interest in drug development and clinical research. No prior experience in clinical research is required.
courses.description:
This course provides an in-depth understanding of clinical research processes, pharmacovigilance, and the regulatory framework governing drug development. Spanning from drug discovery to bioequivalence studies, the course equips learners with the technical knowledge and skills required for careers in clinical research and related fields. Emphasis is placed on practical applications, global regulatory standards, and ethical considerations in the healthcare industry.
Section 1: Introduction
This section introduces the foundational concepts of drug discovery and development. Topics include the approaches to drug discovery, clinical trial methodologies, and significant regulatory milestones such as the Food, Drug & Cosmetic Act and the lessons learned from the Thalidomide tragedy. These lectures set the stage for understanding the critical role of clinical research in drug safety and efficacy.
Section 2: International Conference on Harmonization (ICH)
Gain a comprehensive understanding of the International Conference on Harmonization (ICH), its history, and its impact on global regulatory standards. This section delves into the harmonization process, providing a framework for understanding how consistent regulatory practices ensure drug safety and quality worldwide.
Section 3: Adverse Drug Reactions (ADRs)
This section explores adverse drug reactions, their classifications, and mechanisms. Learners will develop skills to identify, analyze, and manage ADRs, ensuring patient safety and compliance with regulatory requirements.
Section 4: Project Management in Clinical Research
Project management is integral to clinical research success. This section covers project lifecycle stages, Schedule Y guidelines, and the responsibilities of clinical research teams. Learners will gain insights into effective project planning, execution, and documentation practices.
Section 5: Clinical Research Phases
This section examines the various phases of clinical research, from Phase 1 to Phase 4, with detailed discussions on CROs, ICH guidelines, and ICMR principles. Students will learn how each phase contributes to the drug approval process and post-market surveillance.
Section 6: Regulatory Guidelines in Clinical Research
Understanding Good Clinical Practice (GCP) is vital for clinical research. This section introduces the principles of GCP, ICH guidelines, and the process of writing Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs). It also includes a focus on MedWatch and Quality of Life (QOL) assessments.
Section 7: Pharmacovigilance
This section introduces pharmacovigilance, emphasizing the importance of monitoring drug safety throughout its lifecycle. Topics include pharmacodynamics, pharmacokinetics, and clinical trial design, equipping students to manage safety concerns effectively.
Section 8: Clinical Research Process: Outsourcing
Explore the role of outsourcing in clinical research. This section highlights types of contracts, outsourcing processes, and best practices to ensure efficiency and regulatory compliance.
Section 9: Fraud and Misconduct in Clinical Research
Fraud and misconduct undermine the integrity of clinical research. This section examines their prevalence, types, and preventive measures to ensure ethical practices in all stages of clinical research.
Section 10: Special Trials: Bioequivalence and Bioavailability (BABE)
Focused on bioequivalence studies, this section discusses the parameters of bioequivalence and FDA guidelines, preparing students for roles in specialized clinical trials.
Section 11: Communication in Clinical Research

courses.description:
This course is about taking tourists out on a whale or dolphin watching excursion.

There is a growing interest in being able to experience being close-up to and viewing these gentle giants of the sea. They are majestic, non-aggressive and awe-inspiring and mark one of the last frontiers of experience on our planet.
They are also threatened and endangered and need carful protection. Thus most countries of the world have laws and regulations as to what is allowed and no allowed.


If you have a passion for the sea, enjoy marine creatures and are also involved in a commercial whale or dolphin watching business, this course is a must. I try to give an over-sight as to what is important, and what is correct in order to conserve the marine environment, protect the species and to also give tourists an awesome as well as a learning experience.


The course is not only about absorbing facts and  knowledge - I try to impart some broad knowledge and, especially a better understanding of the environment in which you will be working - in other words the entire planet! Cetaceans are not limited to specific areas, and freely roam the oceans looking for food, habitats and places to socialize and reproduce.
They are highly intelligent and harmless creatures that are becoming more important to us again, after we spent numerous past decades exploiting them. Watch each lecture several times to get a feel for the subject matter, so that you may manipulate it to apply for your particular area of operation. Every whale and dolphin watching excursion, as well as each area of operation is different, and there is strictly no right or wrong way to do things.
target_audience: Whale or Dolphin Watching Operators in the Hospitality and Tourism Industry whether or not operating under authority of a Permit.

requirements: Basic understanding of business operations. Interest in international trade and global markets. No prior experience in import-export management is required.
courses.description:
Introduction
The global economy thrives on international trade, making import-export management a crucial skill for businesses and professionals. This course, "Mastering Import and Export Management," equips learners with the knowledge and tools to navigate the complexities of international trade. From understanding trade barriers and documentation to mastering financing procedures and policies, this course is your gateway to becoming a proficient import-export manager.
Section 1: Overview of Import Export Management
This section lays the foundation by introducing students to the structure and key concepts of import-export management. Learners explore the importance of documentation simplification and gain insights into the dynamics of exporting, importing, and countertrade.
Section 2: Understanding Trade Barriers
Students delve into the challenges posed by trade barriers, exploring both tariff and non-tariff barriers, along with quotas and financial controls. This section helps students understand the regulations and obstacles that influence international trade, preparing them to navigate these complexities effectively.
Section 3: Learning Import Export Documentation
Proper documentation is critical to the success of import-export transactions. In this section, learners familiarize themselves with various types of documents, such as the certificate of origin and the letter of credit, which ensure smooth and compliant trade operations.
Section 4: Import Export Financing, Procedure & Primary Considerations
This section focuses on the financial aspects of international trade, including the steps involved in conducting export transactions, accessing export assistance, and understanding primary considerations in trade financing. Practical insights empower students to handle these aspects confidently.
Section 5: Export Import Policy of India
A deep dive into India's EXIM policies, this section explores their evolution, including the EXIM Policy of 1997-2002. Students will understand the general provisions, specific regulations, and implications of these policies, equipping them to operate effectively in the Indian trade environment.
Conclusion
By mastering import-export management, students will be prepared to tackle the challenges of international trade with confidence. This course provides practical knowledge and insights into trade barriers, documentation, financing, and policy, enabling learners to thrive in global markets.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs and business owners looking to expand into international trade. Professionals in supply chain, logistics, or trade management roles. Students and individuals seeking to build a career in global business. Anyone interested in understanding the nuances of import-export operations.

courses.description:
Whether you're new to procurement or a procurement ninja, there's always value in learning.
Interestingly procurement is a professional that is often compartmentalised, that is sometimes different teams manage isolated aspects of the journey.
For example in this session; the Discovery stage, it may be performed by senior staff then handed to the procurement team to develop specifications and issue to market, whereas in other companies or government agencies the initial stages may be performed by a business manager who may then engage procurement to follow the process.  Then we have the case where the procurement team will handle all the tasks from the discovery stage right through to contract management.


Regardless of your situation or how your organisation operates, I believe even if you're not directly involved in this stage it's super important to have an understanding to enable you to better manage your component.


This program migrates through the initial stage of procurement.  This is important as it provides critical inputs for the entire procurement journey.  Often poor procurement outcomes are a function of an ineffective discovery stage.
Through this program we will uncover the context to understand things including legislative, policy and governance requirements, as well as how to identify supply and demand characteristics to better shape your procurement.
target_audience: Anyone working or seeking to work in procurement

courses.title: How to Write a Resume
courses.bio: Find a job in any job market
requirements: None
courses.description:
Hiring is hard. By most accounts, making a hiring decision is a 50-50 situation for employers. As a job seeker, this can be heartbreaking to hear. But rather than focus on what could be construed as negative, this course explores the opportunities for job seekers.
While How to Write a Résumé focuses on career chronicling content, it also shows job seekers a different way of approaching the job hunting process and how to present themselves to employers. This course is for job seekers who are stuck on deciding what to include (and exclude) on a resume. It’s for job seekers who haven’t been in the job market for a while and need an update on what’s what. It is about positioning yourself in the most effective way possible so that hiring managers and recruiters know right away that they should consider you for the opportunity in question.
My goal is not to help you find your dream job. My goal is to help you understand the forces that influence hiring processes in modern times, and how you can best present yourself as a working professional to hiring managers and recruiters. I offer a point of view, informed by ten years of human resources and recruiting experience, that focuses on job seekers’ individual strengths and experiences while educating them on the markets they are working within. Job seekers should focus on what they can control. Put simply, it’s their professional narrative. Take this course and learn how to write yours.
target_audience: Job seekers
People returning to the workforce
People looking for an update on modern hiring practices

What if you could create professional photo edits, YouTube thumbnails, and cinematic graphic designs—without Photoshop or Canva?


This course shows you how to use ChatGPT as your new design studio, capable of delivering results once possible only with years of Photoshop training. With simple prompts, you’ll unlock AI photo editing workflows that let you:


Remove & replace backgrounds for e-commerce product shots, social media posts, and ad campaigns

Unlike Photoshop or Canva, this method requires no layers, no tools, no steep learning curve. You’ll discover how to speak edits into existence—and get studio-grade visuals in minutes.

Produce world-class YouTube thumbnails, social media images, and marketing creatives

courses.description: Learn the basic market structure before you invest.  Learn about stock market flow. After spending years at Etrade and Bank of America, it was clear what the public is missing and how they are misguided by wall street marketing. This course will bridge that gap to start the first step in the right direction. Through the Law of Vibration, every stock in the market moves in its own distinctive sphere of activity, as to intensity, volume, and direction; all the essential qualities of its evolution are characterized in its own rate of vibration. Stocks like atoms are really centers of energies, therefore they are controlled, mathematically. Although the Law Of Vibration comprises a number of elements, the time factor is the most important. The price movement of a stock or commodity unfolds in a coherent way. This is because stocks and commodities are essentially centers of energies and these energies (or vibrations) are controlled mathematically. When the pattern is complete, it may suggest that the price is likely to find support or resistance at one of the Fibonacci levels calculated based on the price level of point D. Note that the Fibonacci levels are only displayed for the last Fibonacci pattern on the chart. Markets demonstrate repetitive patterns where prices oscillate between one set of price ratios and another making price projections possible. Market trends can be defined by geometric relationships as they exhibit harmonic relationships between the price and time swings. Many investors/traders use cycles and harmonic relationships to project future swing price/times. These harmonic price movements produce symmetric rallies and decline to give traders an advantage to determine the key turning points. Symmetry is visible in all markets and in all time frames.

courses.description:
Learn practical steps for guarding data privacy while using Generative AI tools in the workplace.


Generative AI tools are revolutionizing the way we work. To use them effectively, we must be diligent in keeping sensitive information protected. In this Bigger Brains course, we outline how large language models work, explore how Generative AI tools use our data, discuss where that data may come from, and highlight the data privacy risks that should be considered.


You will learn specific ways to protect your data as well as your customer’s data. You’ll also learn how to evaluate privacy policies to help determine which AI tools are safe to trust and which might misuse your data.


Topics covered include:


Defining large language models and multimodal models
Discussing how models are trained on data
Defining grounding data, data classification, and training data
Explaining the types of personal data that AI tools collect
Listing sources of training and grounding data
Identifying ways to block your data from the primary training sources
Explaining the importance of safeguarding customer data
Identifying laws and regulations that apply to specific industries and locations
Listing three techniques for protecting internal data
Defining data loss prevention and data classification
Discussing the difference in privacy levels for free vs. paid versions
Reviewing a sample privacy policy
Identifying the privacy features of common AI tools

courses.description:
Learn to navigate the legal and ethical challenges of using AI in business.


As AI is increasingly integrated into business operations, new and complex issues in intellectual property law must be understood. This Bigger Brains course prepares business professionals to work through these issues. You’ll learn to define and apply key concepts such as intellectual property, liability, and regulatory compliance to both AI inputs and outputs.


You’ll also learn how to evaluate AI tools for legal risks, address bias and confidentiality issues, and explore real-world examples of companies that have succeeded—or failed—in implementing responsible AI policies. By the end of the course, you’ll be equipped with practical steps and actionable policies to help your organization reduce legal exposure and uphold ethical standards in AI use.


Topics covered include:


Defining the uses of AI in business
Defining intellectual property

Discussing liability and legal accountability associated with the use of AI tools

courses.title: 実戦力主義。の統計学　Excel統計学で見えなかったものが見えてくる。
courses.bio: Excelというツールが与えられたとき、統計学は「最強」を超えた学問になった。興味深いデータで楽しく学んでみませんか？統計学が身近なツールであることを実感していただけます。
objectives: Excelをツールとして生きた統計学をビジネスシーンに生かすこと。
Excelアドイン分析ツールの使い方
常識だけでは捉えられない統計学らしいものの考え方
統計学的な「有意」の意味
サンプル数と標本誤差、標本誤差を算出する２つの公式とその意味
ベイズ推定を使った意外な真実の導き方
相関係数の算出とＣＳ分析（ポートフォリオ分析）
Ｆ検定の方法及びＦ検定結果をどのようにｔ検定につなげて行くか
ｔ検定（等分散を仮定した２標本による検定・分散が等しくないと仮定した２標本による検定、１対の標本による平均の検定）など各種検定
単回帰分析と重回帰分析及びそれらに関する決定係数（寄与率）R2乗
行動経済学や心理学で言う「アンカリング効果」をＺ検定で実際に検定する方法
AIにおける機械学習やビッグデータ解析で使われている相関分析や回帰分析の基礎
requirements: 統計学で学ぶ平均や標準偏差の算出方法をマスターしている方
Excelの基本的な操作ができる方（関数の使い方やグラフの作成など基礎的な操作ができる方）
courses.description:
最強の学問と言われる統計学。この統計学を手軽に活用するためのツールがExcelです。Excelに実装されているアドインのExcelデータ分析ツールを使って、医療、教育、経済、人材育成、防災など、あらゆる分野のデータを解析して今まで見えなかったものを見ましょう。広範囲な分野に応用の利くツールの操作方法を、このコースで身につけましょう。
前半３回が理論編で、有意、標本誤差、ベイズ推定を解説します。「有意」は、一般的な用語としても使用されますが、統計学で使われる場合には、その裏にサンプルの存在がありました。かつてテレビで放映された、にぎり寿司を人間（板前さん）がつくった場合と機械（寿司ロボット）がつくった場合でどちらが美味しく感じられるかの勝負を題材に、「有意に美味しい」とは10番勝負だったら何回勝つ必要があるかを検証します。また、標本誤差について知ることは、マスコミなどが調査公表する世論調査などの数字を冷静に受け止めることにつながります。どのくらいのサンプル数があれば、標本誤差を±2.5以内にすることができるのか、などの解説を行います。是非、惑わされない知識を身につけていただければと思います。そしてベイズ推定では、がん検診やＰＣＲ検査を題材に、意外性のある興味深い分析方法を提示します。


中盤３回はスモールデータツール編で、Z検定やｔ検定など、平均に有意な差があるか検定する方法を解説します。Z検定では、実際に受講者に出題したハワイの人口当てクイズのデータをもとに、分析を進めます。ｔ検定には、標本が一対の場合のｔ検定と、そうでない場合のあらかじめF検定をした結果に応じて行われるｔ検定の分析がありますのでそれらの道筋を整理して解説します。標本が一対のｔ検定は、かつて実施したExcel操作研修の効果測定データを使って検定し、一対でない方のｔ検定は、2019年にリアル研修で行った、割り箸を横に咥えると世の中が面白く感じられるか否かを試した実験で得られたデータを使います。


後半３回はビッグデータツール編で、単回帰分析、ＣＳ分析（相関分析）、重回帰分析を解説します。ここで御紹介する回帰分析は、ＡＩを実現している要素のひとつである機械学習に使われます。単回帰分析では、スポーツ庁公表の高齢者歩行データを使った未来予測を行います。ＣＳ分析（相関分析）では、若手職員に実際にアンケート調査を行って得られたデータを使い、若手のやる気を引き出す手法を考察します。非常に応用度の高い分析手法です。重回帰分析では、面接官が途中で退席してしまう場合に、残りの面接官の採点で、退席した面接官が下したであろう評価を推測するＡＩ面接官を作成してみます。
すべてが、身近なデータを使っています。講師がかつて行ったExcel操作研修受講生の上達度データ、若手職員のやる気アンケート、プライミング効果やアンカリング効果を試す簡易な実験結果のデータは実際に得られたものです。また、架空ではありますが、実際のデータを参考に作成したオリジナル面接試験データなど、すべてが興味深い題材をもとに解説しますので、統計学を学ぶ楽しさを感じていただき、統計学やExcelデータ分析が好きになっていただけると思います。
2021年6月：このコースのすべての動画で、字幕をご利用いただけるようになりました。
target_audience: 統計学の切り口で、ビジネスに新しい発想を取り入れたい方

As a professional banker with multinational banking experience and a dedicated expertise in non-financial risk management, I had recruited and led more than 100 AML/CDD professionals in performing various financial crime risk management functions in multiple jurisdictions.

In this course, we will go through key concepts of Customer Due Diligence (CDD) and Know Your Customer (KYC), with emphasis on their applicability in Anti-Money-Laundering (AML) and other financial crime risks management.

We will be looking in-depth of each CDD elements (including but not limited to Identification and Verification, Industry analysis, Country Risks etc.) during KYC, understand the type of risks being associated in the process, and comprehend the different ways of mitigations in managing these risks that are currently being performed in Banks and Financial Institutions.
You will be able to obtain first-hand insights on how these functions are being operated in a Bank, what kind of roles are supporting these functions, as well as their future prospects under various mega-trends. For example, we will be looking in-depth on the applicability in Artificial Intelligence and their impacts to financial crimes risks development; we will also be exploring what kind of employment opportunities are in demand under these mega-trends.

Upon finishing this course, you will be equipped with the critical knowledge you will need to know in financial crimes risks management in Finance and Banking, along with a first-hand understanding of how the field functions.

courses.description:
Your Partner for Compliance with the EU AI Act
Starting February 2025, the EU AI Act will come into force, introducing comprehensive and stringent requirements for companies that develop, implement, or operate artificial intelligence systems. Among the critical elements outlined by the regulation is the mandate to ensure adequate AI competencies among all employees who engage with AI technology in any capacity. This pivotal obligation is explicitly detailed in Article 4 of the regulation.
What implications does this hold for your organization? Beginning in 2025, companies must demonstrate clearly and verifiably that their workforce possesses the necessary skills and knowledge for the responsible handling of AI systems, tailored to the specific areas of deployment and intended user groups. Failure to comply with these mandates could expose your organization to substantial legal, financial, and operational risks, potentially undermining both competitiveness and market credibility.
Our comprehensive solution addresses this requirement directly. regulaid GmbH provides a streamlined, practical, and fully compliant training solution: a targeted 45-minute session delivering essential insights, best practices, and foundational competencies aligned precisely with the AI Act’s directives. Our training is not only concise but also highly practical, ensuring your staff gains immediate and actionable knowledge customized explicitly to your company's needs.
Why is immediate action crucial? With limited time remaining before February 2025, proactive measures are essential to align your company’s practices with regulatory standards. Engage regulaid now to smoothly build your organization's AI competencies, ensuring readiness and compliance without delay.
Invest today in a secure AI-driven future. Schedule your initial training session and position your company advantageously ahead of the regulatory curve defined by the EU AI Act.
target_audience: Employees in companies that use AI and want to ensure compliance with the requirements of the EU AI Act.

courses.description:
With hundreds of centralised exchanges and thousands of cryptocurrencies, it's very hard to keep track of your investments, trades and bots. Bitsgap is able to unify all of these under one platform.
It is an all-in-one trading automation platform for bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.
It helps you trade on multiple exchanges and quickly switch from one to the other, compare rates from all the markets and keep track of your investments (and portfolios). You can do manual trading (with stop loss, take profit and some other, more advanced, techniques), arbitrage (by exploiting price differences between portfolios) and it also features a demo mode to test everything before you use real money.
It also has trading bots that use automated algorithms to generate a profit without you having to manually login at 3 a.m. in the morning to monitor your trades.
The platform has been featured in a lot of articles in the crypto space including CoinGecko, AMB Crypto, Elite CurrenSea, BeInCrypto, RippleNews and CaptainAltcoin.
In this course I'll walk you through Bitsgap's interface and features.
Specifically:
How to use the chart tools to plot strategies on various cryptocurrencies
How to create various types of orders (limit, market, stop, stop limit, shadow, TWAP, OCO and more)
The very basics of arbitrage via Bitsgap's interface
How to start the 4 bots Bitsgap provides (Sbot, Classic bot, Scalper bot and Combo bot)
This course is not for someone interested in getting a quick strategy or learning trading techniques. It's an overview of Bitsgap's features and how to use its interface to do the things you already know how to do.
I can't wait to see you on the other side!
target_audience: The very beginners in trading who are curious about Bitsgap's main features

courses.title: Berke Assessment Mastery: 6 Cognitive Practice Tests: 300 Qs
courses.bio: Ace the Berke Assessment! 300+ questions in Problem Solving, Logic, Numerical & Spatial Reasoning.
courses.description:
The Berke Assessment is a leading psychometric tool used by companies worldwide to identify candidates with strong problem-solving abilities and a quick capacity to learn and adapt. Its cognitive component, often termed the "Problem Solving" test, measures your pure aptitude, critical thinking, and logical reasoning skills under strict time constraints. Excelling on this assessment is a key differentiator in today's competitive job market.
This comprehensive course, "Berke Assessment Mastery: 6 Full Cognitive Practice Tests," is your ultimate resource for conquering this challenging exam. We provide six meticulously designed, full-length practice tests, each with 50 unique questions, totaling an impressive 300 in-depth practice questions. Every single question comes with a clear, step-by-step explanation, ensuring you not only find the correct answer but also master the underlying logic and efficient problem-solving techniques essential for the Berke Assessment.
You will gain a deep understanding and extensive practice across all the core cognitive areas evaluated by the Berke Assessment's Problem Solving test:
Logical Reasoning: Sharpen your deductive and inductive reasoning skills, including transitive inference, pattern recognition, and drawing sound conclusions.
Numerical Reasoning: Master basic arithmetic, numerical sequences, and quick mathematical problem-solving without a calculator.
Spatial Reasoning: Enhance your ability to visualize and manipulate shapes and patterns in your mind.
You will also encounter questions designed to test your attention to detail, memory, and verbal comprehension – all crucial aspects of cognitive aptitude.
The most critical aspect of the Berke Assessment's cognitive section is its intense time limit: 15 minutes for 50 questions. This course is specifically designed to help you build the speed, accuracy, and mental agility required to perform under this immense pressure. objectives: How to structure an initial meeting with a major donor prospect.

requirements: No previous fundraising experience required. You will learn how to start developing fruitful donor relationships.
courses.description:
Have you ever wondered how to structure an initial meeting with a donor, especially with someone who is - or may become - a donor to your organization?


Fundraising is both a science and an art... but when it comes down to it, raising funds from individuals starts by getting to know them and developing a relationship - one that is centered around your mission and their philanthropic interests.


In this training, you will learn how to structure your first meeting with a donor and the questions to ask to help you learn more about your donors' philanthropy and personal story about why they support your mission.


Not only that, you'll learn that these meetings don't need to be intimidating (though it's OK to feel intimidated). They can be fun and make for an incredibly rewarding conversation and visit with your donors.


Another incredibly useful process that you will learn in this training is called, “Moves Management,” a framework for your major gifts initiatives. Moves Management is a simple process that will help you track the status of your individual donor relationships – from identifying who may be your best prospects for a major gift, to asking them to give, to receiving the gift – every step of the way.


This training goes into the "discovery and qualification" stages. You will learn how to answer the question, "Could this person become a major donor?" with the use of a few simple tools.


And what’s even better is that the more you begin to use the process you will learn in this course, the easier it will become. The first few times you have an initial meeting with a donor may be the most intimidating as you’re laying the groundwork and are learning a LOT… but after you've met with one, two, three, and more? You’ll begin to get excited for these meetings and feel the structure flow with ease…\


I'm so excited to jump into Major Gift Fundraising 101: The First Donor Meeting with you!
target_audience: Nonprofit fundraisers, executive directors, founders, and Board members helping with development.
Those new to major gifts and raising funds from individuals.

courses.title: Principles of Macroeconomics - College or AP Level
courses.bio: A college level course in Macroeconomics, including global economics, monetary and fiscal policy and political economy
objectives: Macroeconomic Theory
The course will provide a deeper background in diverse contributors and their impacts on economic thought and analysis
Measures of unemployment, inflation, national income, inequality and wealth and their roles in shaping policy
Achieving sustainable economic growth and stability
Effective functioning of the financial system

Introduction: Choice In A World of Scarcity

requirements: Basic mathematics. My Principles of Microeconomic course will help with foundational information.
courses.description:
Why Study Economics? Economics seeks to solve the problem of scarcity, which is when human wants for goods and services exceed the available supply. A modern economy displays a division of labor, in which people earn income by specializing in what they produce and then use that income to purchase the products they need or want. The division of labor allows individuals and firms to specialize and to produce more for several reasons: a) It allows the agents to focus on areas of advantage due to natural factors and skill levels; b) It encourages the agents to learn and invent; c) It allows agents to take advantage of economies of scale. Division and specialization of labor only work when individuals can purchase what they do not produce in markets. Learning about economics helps you understand the significant world's problems. Today prepares you to be a good citizen and helps you become a well-rounded thinker.
Microeconomics and macroeconomics are two different perspectives on the economy. The microeconomic perspective focuses on parts of the economy: individuals, firms, and industries. The macroeconomic perspective looks at the economy as a whole, focusing on goals like growth in the standard of living, unemployment, and inflation. Macroeconomics has two types of policies for pursuing these goals: monetary policy and fiscal policy.
Course Descriptor: An introduction to the economic principles of employment, money, and growth. This course will teach students about significant macroeconomic measures and policies. Students will learn how measures of unemployment, inflation, national income, inequality, and wealth shape policy. We also focus on achieving economic growth and sustainability through the effective functioning of the financial system, monetary and fiscal policies, and international trade policies.
Learning Objectives: Students will develop an understanding and basic proficiency in the theory and application of macroeconomic concepts. The text uses conversational language and ample illustrations to explore economic theories and provides many examples using fictional and real-world applications. We will explore recent developments and provide a more profound background on diverse contributors and their impacts on economic thought and analysis.
target_audience: High School and College students
Policy makers
Business owners and entrepreneurs

courses.description:
In today’s business landscape, measuring and managing ESG performance is no longer optional—it’s a competitive advantage. Investors, regulators, customers and employees all expect transparency on how organizations address environmental impact, social responsibility and governance practices.
The ESG Metrics Masterclass is designed to give you the knowledge and confidence to track, report and improve ESG performance effectively. Whether you are a sustainability professional, business leader, consultant or student, this course will help you navigate the complex world of ESG measurement and reporting with clarity and confidence. You will gain actionable insights that can be immediately applied to enhance sustainability outcomes and stakeholder trust.
You’ll learn to identify the right metrics for your industry, also identify both qualitative and quantitative indicators, and align them with internationally recognized sustainability frameworks such as GRI, SASB and TCFD. It serves as a revision only and not intended to be an exact replica of the live exams but it will at least highlight which learning outcomes you are strong on and which ones you may need to revised more on. Who this course is for:

Learners who are taking the CIPS Exams for L4M4 Ethical & Responsible Sourcing (2023 Syllabus).

In any organisation, a significant element of procurement and supply activity is based around decisions to internally conduct activity or to source from an external supplier. The selection of the optimal external suppliers is a vital contributor to overall organisational success. This module enables professionals with roles in procurement and supply to formulate sourcing strategies and selection criteria to ensure that the organisation can make the best choice of external suppliers. This module explains options for sourcing, and examines the key processes that can be applied to the analysis of potential external suppliers to ensure sourcing arrangements meet sustainable, environmental, social and ethical goals.

On completion of this module, learners will be able to explain the options and associated processes available for sourcing with external suppliers. They will also examine the legal and ethical impact and the implications of sustainability, encompassing economic, environmental, social and governance factors on the final sourcing decision.

Thank you for taking this course with me.

Peace at Last...including on the High Seas?

requirements: None, though an interest in history and diplomacy, and curiosity about the world, helps
courses.description:
For most of the 20th century, the name Vietnam was synonymous in many people’s minds with conflict and war. Indeed, the country’s struggle to free itself from colonialism, and subsequent civil wars, provided plenty of real life war experience. No sooner had one side in the ideological battle won victory, then the world around Vietnam began to move on from that ideology. The legal and political system put in place by the victors was suddenly out of step with global trends and in need of overhaul. Come see how Vietnam is managing this transition and consider where the 21st century may lead it.

courses.description:
In today's rapidly evolving workplace environments, maintaining robust safety standards isn't just about compliance—it's about protecting your most valuable asset: your people. The "Mastering Continuous Risk Assessment" course delivers comprehensive, practical training designed specifically for South African workplace safety professionals, supervisors, and managers who seek to implement effective, ongoing risk management processes.
This meticulously structured course goes beyond theoretical concepts to provide actionable strategies that align with South African health and safety regulations. Over five carefully crafted sections, you'll develop the expertise needed to identify hazards, evaluate risks, implement controls, and foster a sustainable safety culture within your organization.
Beginning with a foundation in legal requirements specific to South African workplaces, you'll gain clarity on compliance obligations while understanding the fundamental principles that underpin continuous risk assessment. You'll learn systematic approaches to categorizing workplace hazards—from physical and chemical risks to psychosocial factors that often go unaddressed in traditional safety programs.
The course provides detailed preparation frameworks to ensure your risk assessments are thorough and effective. You'll master techniques for gathering essential information, assembling appropriate teams, and developing assessment tools tailored to your specific industry and operational environment.
A significant portion of the training focuses on conducting continuous risk assessments with practical, hands-on approaches. You'll discover strategies for identifying potential hazards, evaluating their severity and likelihood, and prioritizing interventions. Uniquely, this course addresses the human element of risk assessment, teaching valuable skills for facilitating collaborative assessments that build team cohesion rather than creating workplace tension.
The final section delivers comprehensive guidance on remedial action implementation and follow-up—often the most crucial yet overlooked aspect of the risk management process. You'll learn how to develop structured action plans, implement appropriate controls following the hierarchy of control principles, and establish robust verification mechanisms to ensure ongoing effectiveness.
By completing this course, you'll be equipped with:
Practical tools for implementing continuous risk assessment processes
Techniques for identifying and categorizing various workplace hazards
Strategies for prioritizing and addressing identified risks
Methods for fostering team collaboration during safety initiatives
Systems for tracking, documenting, and following up on remedial actions
Approaches for building a sustainable safety culture
Whether you're new to workplace safety management or looking to enhance your existing program, this course provides the comprehensive knowledge and practical skills needed to create safer, healthier, and more productive workplaces across South Africa.
target_audience: The course is suitable for both new and experienced safety professionals, business owners, project managers, consultants, operations managers, production supervisors and line managers. courses.title: Top 10 Mistakes of Utah Notaries
courses.bio: Common and misunderstood practices to avoid
objectives: Top 10 mistakes made by notaries. Utah edition
requirements: Be commissioned or plan to become commissioned as a notary public
courses.description:
Patterned after the study guide provided by the Utah Lieutenant Governor's Office, this course expounds on each section and provides additional insight on the consequences of those mistakes. Whether the failure is on the part of the notary or the employer, liability doesn't disappear, and it is important to understand the details of each subsection to avoid legal problems. This course includes clauses from various parts of the statute and provides students with the tools they need to prepare for the test or simply clarify the purposes behind the statutory language.
Years ago, when I was the Office Administrator for the Lieutenant Governor's Office, I wrote nearly all of the questions for the test along with the Notary Study Guide, so I know what you need to study. Most of the material is still used today, and if you think it is complicated now, you should have seen the test when it was administered through a contractor in another state; roughly 35 percent of applicants were failing the test. Test administrators justified the super-wordy approach under the claim that the State needed to filter out less qualified applicants. I disagree. Becoming a notary should not be a complicated process, and if you watch my videos before you take the test, you will have the material I wanted to share with all notaries when I managed the program.  Refer back to these videos as much as you need, and good luck on the test!
target_audience: Notaries and notary applicants

courses.title: Living Law® Taiwan-125 years of political/legal evolution
courses.bio: An island with a history of making waves.
requirements: None, though an interest in history and diplomacy, and curiosity about the world, helps
courses.description:
The island of Taiwan has been home to peoples from both near and far over the centuries. Polynesians, Chinese, Portuguese, Dutch, and Japanese have all called the island home. The strategic location of the island has made it sought after and fought over throughout its history. Each wave of visitors and conquerors left its imprint on the cultural, political and legal fabric of the societies on Taiwan.
In the 20th century, Taiwan became the last outpost of the Nationalist forces who were driven from the Chinese mainland in the Chinese civil war. To get a feel for the authoritarian period which followed, Living Law® travels to the Matsu Islands, which used to be at the front lines of the inner-Chinese military conflict. We cover the key features of the long period of martial law, as well as the bilateral defence treaty which (militarily and economically) tied the United States to Taiwan throughout the Cold War. More than once it looked as though Taiwan could become the trigger to a Third World War.
The US pivot to the People's Republic in the 1970's had dramatic repercussions for Taiwan. We examine the diplomatic agreements which aimed to maneuver through international waters as treacherous as those of the Taiwan Straits. We focus especially on the role of state recognition under international law.
Despite the geopolitical shifts and the death of its President, the Taiwanese people hardly stood still. Within just two decades, Taiwan emerged from one-party rule and martial law to become one of Asia's economic tigers. We cover Taiwan's reaction to a "rising China," tracing a series of cross-Straits cooperation agreements which helped de-escalate historic tensions.  Finally, we consider the prospects for Taiwan's future under application of the "One China" policy of the People's Republic. Is it possible to bring a democratic society of 23.6 million people within the framework of a Communist system which rules over 1.4 billion people? Recent events (August 2022) have shown just how precarious the situation in the Taiwan Straits can get!
target_audience: businesspersons, educators and students, travellers, professional and armchair diplomats

في عالمنا اليوم سريع الخطى، فإن المعرفة بالمنتجات المصرفية والمالية ليست مجرد ضرورة؛ بل إنها أداة قوية يمكن أن تساعدك على اتخاذ قرارات مالية أفضل وتأمين مستقبلك وتحقيق أهدافك. هذه الدورة هي فرصتك لكسر الحواجز التي ربما تمنعك من الفهم الكامل لعالم الخدمات المصرفية.


بحضورك البرنامج التدريبى ده هيساعدك:
- هساعدك فى فهم عميق للمنتجات والخدمات التي تقدمها البنوك.
- استكشاف الحسابات المصرفية المتاحة، وتزويد نفسك بالمعرفة الكاملة للاستفادة منها بشكل فعال.
- اختيار البطاقات المصرفية الأكثر ملاءمة بمهارة، مثل بطاقات الخصم والائتمان والبطاقات المدفوعة مسبقًا، وتمييز ميزاتها الفريدة.
- تحديد وتجنب الأخطاء الشائعة المرتبطة باستخدام بطاقة الائتمان، وضمان الإدارة المالية المسؤولة.
- هتعرف تطور استراتيجيات تحمى بيها نفسك وحساباتك البنكية من عمليات الاحتيال عبر الإنترنت، مما يعزز أمنك المالي.
- هتقدر تكون معرفة شاملة حول التحويلات المصرفية وفهم الأسباب الشائعة لرفض التحويل.
- هتقدر تكون رؤية كاملة حول الشيكات المصرفية، والتعرف على الأخطاء الشائعة التي يجب تجنبها عند كتابة الشيكات المصرفية.

courses.description:
In just 15 short lessons, we’ll cover everything you need to know to protect your trucking business, your drivers, and your cargo.
You’ll start by learning the basics of trucking insurance—why it’s essential, the legal requirements, and how the insurance process works. From there, we’ll explore the different types of coverage every carrier should know, including auto liability, cargo, physical damage, general liability, workers’ comp, and umbrella policies.
You’ll also discover how to choose the right insurer and policy, how premiums are calculated, and the most effective ways to reduce and optimize your insurance costs without sacrificing protection. We’ll break down common mistakes to avoid, review real-world claim examples, and explain the claims and damage recovery process step by step.
The course also looks at how insurance companies evaluate your drivers—based on their CDL state, years of experience, violations, and accident history—and how this directly impacts your premium. You’ll gain insights into industry trends, including telematics, AI in claims handling, cyber risk protection, and eco-friendly policies.
Finally, we’ll show you how to use tools like the CAB Report to better understand risk, negotiate with insurers, and keep your fleet protected as the industry evolves.
By the end, you’ll have a clear roadmap for making smarter insurance decisions, cutting unnecessary costs, and building a safety net that keeps your business strong—no matter what the road throws at you.
target_audience: Trucking companies
Insurance Agents

courses.description:
In construction, have you ever wondered how a company finds work and what the process is in both the public & private sectors.
In a snapshot, if a business requires goods or services from a construction company (A Need), they will typically go through a procurement process to identify a suitable contractor. As part of this process (called Tendering), they will develop and issue an invitation to tender.
Simultaneously, contractors are constantly on the lookout for work. Obtaining information about upcoming projects is a big part of the overall marketing effort of a construction company.
But what does this mean, and how do you go about responding to it?
In this course, you and me will be learning about the process of tendering / bidding for construction projects, but specifically from an estimator’s role within a construction company.
During the course, we will be using a past tender to make the learning journey as real as possible so that you will be provided with the confidence and foundation skills to take your first steps into estimating.
If you are already employed in the construction industry or wanting to learn what the role of an Estimator is during the tendering / bidding process for a construction project, then this course is for you.
So that said, enrol now and learn about the tendering / bidding process for a construction project from the Estimator’s seat.

courses.description:
In this course, we are going to learn the essentials of permit-to-work systems that describe good practices in occupational safety and health.
Course Outlines:
Number of Sections: 2
Number of Lectures: 9
Lectures Duration: 1 Hour 5 Minutes
Permit-tow-work will be particularly useful to the onshore and offshore petroleum industry, onshore chemical and allied industries and other industries. The potential for serious incidents in these industries is clear, and permit-to-work systems are a vital part of effective management of the hazards.
This course will help students to learn the basics of permit-to-work systems. Before they start working, employers and their workers should agree on the details of the system and sign the agreement. These details include the type of workers that are allowed to work for a particular company, what activities these workers will be doing while working, whether they will be using specific machines, etc.
Workers can also sign a contract in which they agree that they will not be doing anything illegal or unsafe while they are working for the company. It is essential for a worker to be knowledgeable about the permit-to-work system. Workers need to know how the company manages health and safety. They should also know the different risks that might threaten their safety and health. A permit-to-work system will ensure that no one is exposed to these risks and that workers are properly trained. It is also good to have a training program for workers.

courses.title: Understanding Your Volunteers - Why do people volunteer?
courses.bio: This is a short, free Volunteer Management course on Understanding your Volunteers
requirements: None
courses.description:
This is a short, free Volunteer Management course on Understanding your Volunteers.
This course is suited to anyone who is new to volunteer management or has spent less that two years managing volunteers.
This course is built to help you get to know your volunteers better.
It will help you understand their motivations for volunteering, which tend to be surprisingly similar across most demographics.
It will help you understand how to use these motivations to create a better, more satisfying and more impactful volunteer program.
It will help you understand how to motivate your volunteers more effectively and how to maintain that motivation over time.
It will help you understand some core elements of building a volunteer program that can retain volunteers over time (reducing the need for expensive and time consuming recruitment programs) and keep them satisfied and motivated.
It will also give you some insight into some core questions you should ask your volunteers and when to ask them, to make sure you're getting the most important information before they start.
This course is all about setting you and your volunteers up for success.
This course is shorter than my other courses and offered free, the style is a bit more relaxed but I hope you will still find value in it. Please feel free to leave feedback throughout the course and let me know if there's any other things you'd like me to talk about in future.

See you in the course!
target_audience: This course is for anyone who is new to volunteer management or within the first couple of years of working with volunteers.

Ready to master Generative AI? This comprehensive Gen AI for beginners course is designed specifically for product managers seeking to lead in the new era of AI-powered product development.
We frame Generative AI not merely as a technological advancement, but as a "tsunami of change" comparable to the advent of electricity and the internet. This program is more than a series of lectures; it's a hands-on AI bootcamp designed to take you from zero to confident in applying AI to your daily work.
You will gain a foundational understanding of core Generative AI concepts, including how Large Language Models (LLMs) work, the emergence of autonomous AI agents, and the shift towards multimodal AI. The course emphasizes a practical approach with a strong focus on "learning by doing," mentorship, and portfolio building.
Key takeaways include mastering effective prompt crafting, understanding the PM's evolving role, and applying Generative AI to the entire productizing process. Through live demos and practical exercises, like persona creation with DALL-E and GPT-4, you'll develop the essential mindset—empathy, creativity, and a "tinkerer" mentality—to thrive.

Participants will get to know the requirements for ISO 9001:2015 Quality management system (QMS), ISO 14001:2015 Environmental management system (EMS), and ISO 45001:2018 occupational health and safety management system (OHSMS), which are the cornerstone of the Integrated Management System of any organizations, benefits of implementing QMS, EMS, and OHSMS. Everything will be briefly and effectively covered in the IMS Awareness Training course. The training will provide a clear understanding of IMS Integrated Management System standard requirements, IMS documented information and certification process. The Job Search Solution is the process to get a job!

There are three major reasons people have trouble finding a job.
1. They don't know what to do!

A recent survey found that 86% of a group of 15,000 job seekers were resorting to only two activities to find a job...calling a few friends and sending resumes to internet job postings. The Job Search Solution explains exactly what to do for an effective job search well beyond these two fruitless activities. objectives: Understand the basics of copywriting and the different types of copywriting, including the psychology of persuasion and how it applies to copywriting.
