requirements: There are no requirements for this course.
courses.description:
We all experience challenging times. This is our common human experience. What's important is how we respond. Our ability to navigate stressful times can make or break our success. Resilience helps us face those challenges head on and bounce back from them, meaning, we don't quit, we learn.
When we’re emotionally resilient and emotionally healthy, our ability to handle stress and challenges increases. We are more creative, authentic, innovative, and have better personal and professional relationships. Successful emotion regulation is key to resilience (Troy & Mauss, 2011).
Without emotional resilience, communication and interpersonal skills suffer, leading to conflict and misunderstandings that could have been avoided. If we want to be the best versions of ourselves as entrepreneurs, leaders, and professionals, our emotional resilience is our hidden superpower.
As emotionally resilient people, we can approach business challenges with a growth mindset, viewing obstacles as opportunities rather than setbacks. This perspective opens doors to creative solutions and adaptability. As entrepreneurs or business professionals, how many of us are looking for business strategies or ways to be more productive at work, instead of fixing our eyes on the deeper issues? According to studies from Harvard Business Review, resilient leaders tend to be more productive, creative, and satisfied in their roles.
Our emotional health is a crucial part of this whole equation — and prioritizing it can change our lives and business. It’s not easy to face the inner critic, the voices inside, and the limiting beliefs we carry, but we must. We have to begin to acknowledge that external activities are not cutting it. We must dig deeper.
We often get so caught up in strategies, growth, business planning, and pushing ourselves to achieve that we forget the one thing that holds it all together: our well-being.


This isn't just a typical course; it's an interactive and experiential TOOLKIT with tried, tested, and verified techniques and strategies to help you develop practical skills to build emotional resilience.


There are 113 mini-lessons and exercises led by several licensed mental health professionals, industry experts, and healthcare professionals to enhance your emotional well-being, empowering you to move through challenges with strength and clarity for long-term professional sustainability.
Emotional health and resilience are non-negotiable advantages in our professional toolkit. These directly impact performance, relationships, and physical well-being, and investing in emotional resilience is as essential as investing in any other skill for business growth.
Health is the foundation from which everything else is built and impacts every area of our life, that is why being our healthiest — mind, body, and spirit — is so important to living a fulfilled life and having a thriving career.


If you're ready to develop a growth mindset, cultivate more self-compassion and self-love, strengthen your ability to manage stress, prevent burnout, and build up your resilience, then you are in the right place!
target_audience: Female Entrepreneurs Who Want to Build Sustainable Business Success
Women Who Work in a Helping Profession
Women Executives and Leaders Who Want to Thrive In Their Role and Create Healthy Work Environments
Any Entrepreneur or Professional - Content is Curated for Women but Anyone Can Benefit From the Lessons

courses.title: Master AI in Personal Finance for Smarter Investing
courses.bio: Use AI to automate investing, optimize budgeting, manage risk, and plan your financial future—smarter and with confide
requirements: No prior knowledge of AI, programming, or finance is required.
Just bring a willingness to learn and basic internet skills.
Access to a computer or smart device for exploring free tools and demos.
An interest in improving your financial habits using smart, modern techniques.
courses.description:
Personal finance has changed—and AI is leading the way.
In this practical, beginner-friendly course, you’ll learn how to leverage AI tools and strategies to build smarter investment portfolios, automate your budgeting, detect risk before it strikes, and make tax season less stressful.
You don’t need to be a data scientist or programmer—this course is designed for real people who want to make real progress with their money using today’s smartest technologies. You’ll understand how robo-advisors work, how AI algorithms make financial predictions, and how to use automation to simplify and optimize your personal finance decisions.
By the end, you’ll have the mindset, tools, and system to take control of your financial life with the power of AI.
What You’ll Learn
How AI is transforming modern personal finance and investing
How to build an investment strategy using algorithmic insights
How to automate budgeting and saving based on your goals
How to detect financial risk using simulations and forecasting
What robo-advisors are and how they can serve your needs
How to handle taxes and reporting with AI-based tools
Key ethical considerations and trends shaping the future of AI finance
Who This Course Is For
Anyone who wants to improve personal finances using smart tools
Beginner and intermediate investors looking to automate their portfolios
Professionals who want to plan better for savings, risk, and taxes
Anyone curious about AI applications in real-world money management
Requirements
No programming or finance background required
Internet connection to explore tools and demos
An open mind toward using AI-based solutions in personal finance
Call to Action
Ready to make AI your financial partner?
Join the course today and take control of your finances with powerful, automated, and future-proof strategies.
[Enroll Now – Start Building Wealth Smarter]
Your Learning Journey
This course begins by showing you how artificial intelligence is transforming the world of personal finance, giving you a fresh perspective on managing money with the latest technology. You’ll then dive into how AI can analyze investment options, build smarter portfolios, and help predict financial trends before they happen. As your understanding grows, you’ll explore how to automate budgeting and saving strategies to make your financial habits more efficient and goal-driven. You’ll also learn how to identify and manage risk using simulation tools that give you deeper insight into your financial decisions. From there, you’ll discover how robo-advisors work and how to use AI tools to simplify tax preparation and reporting. Finally, you’ll wrap up with a look at the future—understanding the ethical use of financial AI, upcoming trends, and how to stay ahead of the curve in this fast-evolving space.
Instructor Bio
The Educational Engineering Team brings over a decade of experience in applied tech education—now extending that expertise into AI-powered financial literacy. With a focus on practical, everyday applications, their courses help learners around the world solve real problems using cutting-edge tools, all while keeping things beginner-friendly and actionable.
FAQ
Q: Do I need coding experience?
A: Nope. Everything is taught for beginners with no technical background.
Q: Do I need to connect bank accounts?
A: No real accounts are needed—tools are introduced in theory or sandbox mode.
Q: Will I get a certificate?
A: Yes, you’ll receive a certificate of completion from Udemy.
Q: Will I learn how to invest?
A: You’ll learn AI tools and techniques that support smarter investing decisions.
Ready to make smarter financial decisions with AI?
Join today and start building lasting wealth.
target_audience: Beginners looking to take control of their finances using the latest AI-driven tools.
Investors who want to enhance decision-making with automation and data.
Professionals who interested in practical AI applications in everyday life.
Anyone curious about AI applications in real-world money management

courses.title: Medical Commodities Blueprint
courses.bio: Learn How To Flip Medical Commodities
requirements: No tech barriers you can get going immediately
courses.description:
If You Know About The Flipping Items For Profit Then The Medical Commodities Blueprint Course Is For You. This Course Will Teach You 40 Strategies You'll Need To Know For Jump Starting Your Business Flipping Medical Commodities AND I Will Share With You a Buyer’s List You Can Use to Start Selling Your Products To.


Here's What You Receive When You Buy The Medical Commodities Blueprint Course!


What is flipping medical commodities? Introduction to an unknown market with profit margins like you’ve never seen before!
The 5 steps you need to take to start your own Highly Profitable Medical Commodities Business...and the 7 deadly mistakes to avoid
A complete breakdown on how to find test strips and flip them to your end buyers for major profit
Access to me, a mentor that has done it and knows all the pitfalls and can show you the way to avoid them and guide you to build your own business.


Do you have the knowledge that will make you win?


Lots of people have the drive and even the right mindset to make the money, but without the specialized knowledge I can provide, access to people who have done it before and that can show you the ropes using and a tried and tested formula, you probably won’t go anywhere. You’ll end up wasting a lot of time and opportunity, ultimately quitting because of how lost you are.


Trust me, I’ve been there, done that, and that is why I’m dispensing with this advice.

But who am I, anyway?


My story


Back in September 2020, I discovered the beauty of re-selling medical commodities.


More exactly, diabetic test strips. Using the internet, something that hasn’t been done very often in the medical commodities business, I was able to grow this business to five plus figures a month.


There was something else I was doing that I didn’t see a lot of people doing - I got the product before I had to pay for it, which meant that I had a lot more cash flow than my competition.


When I realized no one was teaching my method of doing things, I thought to myself that there have to be more people who would like to know how to do things my way and get rich while trying!


Before Flipping Medical Commodities


Like you, I faced one major problem; I made enough, but not enough to do what I wanted. I used to work long hours slaving away in two jobs. I found myself doing back-breaking work that didn’t earn me more than between 15 to 25 dollars an hour. I don’t have to tell you how energy-consuming and especially hope-consuming that was. It made me realize that most honest jobs keep you trapped in working long hours for little money and never having enough to fulfill your dreams.


“I know it sounds like a fantasy, but buying and reselling affordable products that people need consistently is the key. When I found out, only in September, of the existence of flipping medical commodities business I couldn’t believe it. This led me to the first diabetic test strip reselling. From there I was able to get started with just a few hundred dollars and grow to $5,000, $10,000, and more per month without having to learn any complicated systems, tools, or methods.


The Start of The Business


I started with $40 buying my first couple of supplies, invoicing, waiting for payment, then shipping. I kept consistent and turned that $40 into 5.3k in sales (2.6k profit) in my first month. Now, with all my consistency, I have a stable business with many repeat clients that hit me back up with more strips every 14, 30, 60 days later. My business just keeps growing.


Although this may seem like easy money, you have to realize that just like with every business, you must be relentless and consistent. If you have what it takes, you can take control of your finances with this money-grabbing business. And I want to teach you how you can succeed by flipping medical commodities, most exactly, test strips.


The process is simple. You buy, sell to your end buyer and repeat.


These commodities are in high demand and you will find thousands of them in every city across the United States. You will NOT regret this investment you make in yourself. Don’t waste another minute in starting your own business and your journey to getting rich! What are you waiting for?
target_audience: Beginners Entrepreneurs who understanding flipping

courses.title: CIPS Level 2 - Introducing Procurement and Supply [L2M1]
courses.bio: Certificate in Procurement and Supply
courses.description:
An organisation will be supplying products and/or services to their customers. It's the procurement's function to source these from your suppliers. Every procurement professional should aim to do this cost efficiently, however, there are other considerations, such as time, places of supply and delivery, ethical suppliers, available resources, quality of suppliers (to name a few).
Before starting in a procurement and supply profession, it is important you understand the fundamental roles and activities that is required within the function. You are also required to understand the systems, procedures and processes.
Did you know that an organisation can spend up to 72% of a companies revenues on purchasing products and services?
That's a lot of responsibility!
This module covers key terms used in procurement and supply, key roles and components, organisational impact of procurement and supply, the 5 rights of procurement, how goods and services are received from suppliers, stages of procurement and supply, efficient and effective administration of purchases with external suppliers, and ethical and responsible procurement.
Remember, this is an introductory module, so each outcome will be introductory to each topic.
This is why it is a bigger module (6 credits) than the others.
We have a lot of ground to cover, so let's get started.
target_audience: Anyone that is new to the procurement profession
Anyone interested in procurement and supply profession
Anyone wishing an introductory knowledge of procurement and supply function
Anyone sitting the CIPS level 2 exams.

courses.description: Everyday Empathy at Work, is a comprehensive, insightful course meticulously crafted to advance comprehension, communication, and emotional intelligence within a professional setting. This course embodies a clear focus on how empathetic behaviors can contribute significantly to improving interpersonal relationships amongst staff members, cultivating a congenial and supportive work environment, and amplifying overall team productivity. As we delve deeper into the content, the course reveals a host of useful techniques to elevate active listening skills, an essential quality that fosters mutual respect and cooperation. This, in turn, sparks a more open, honest dialogue which is crucial for creative collaboration and making informed decisions. The course also sheds light on managing conflicts constructively, thus helping to diffuse tense situations, prevent miscommunication, and ultimately, forge stronger, healthier work relationships. Moreover, as we live in an increasingly diverse world, understanding and recognizing different emotional cues is pivotal. This course provides indispensable tools and strategies to read, interpret and respond appropriately to a variety of emotional cues — a skill that prompts deeper, more substantial connections with peers, superiors, clients, and other stakeholders alike. "Everyday Empathy at Work" extends novel, practical strategies that can seamlessly integrate empathy into everyday work situations. Designed to ensure that empathy is not just understood but is practically utilized, this course is the ideal learning avenue for those seeking to enhance their work culture substantially. Whether you're a senior executive, a fledgling team leader, or an individual who interacts daily with colleagues and clients, you will surely benefit from the impactful lessons this course imparts to make the workplace more understanding, respected, and highly efficient. In conclusion, "Everyday Empathy at Work" paves a path to a more harmonious, productive work environment by embedding empathy at the core of all its teachings. The lessons learned in this course are not only applicable to work but rather extend to all facets of life, making it an experience worth enrolling in.
target_audience: This course is for senior executives looking to foster a more empathetic and productive work environment.
Everyday Empathy at Work, is tailored for team leaders seeking to enhance their active listening skills and manage conflicts constructively.
Professionals who interact regularly with colleagues and clients can benefit greatly from this course, as it helps improve comprehension, communication, and emotional intelligence.
Employees who wish to better their workplace relationships through deepened understanding and respect should consider this course.
This course is ideal for individuals working in a diverse environment and seeking to understand and respond appropriately to different emotional cues.
For anyone looking to extend empathy lessons beyond the workplace and into other facets of life, "Everyday Empathy at Work" is the perfect course.

requirements: You will need to have achieved the CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply.
courses.description:
Who is it for?
Provides senior buyers, contract and supply chain managers with the expertise to improve organisational procurement and to fulfil organisational objectives. It gives you the knowledge base to reduce cost, improve quality and timescales, manage the supply chain and deal with legal issues.

What will I learn?
Building on the practical knowledge and understanding gained at CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply you will develop a higher level of practical, theoretical and technical knowledge and understanding of procurement and supply. Your learning will focus on how to deal with key aspects of risk in supply chains and mitigation of those risks; processing and evaluating contracts and the impact of legal implications when contracts are breached. On completion of this qualification you can expect to improve your overall organisational procurement and supply performance to fulfil your organisational objectives.

Entry requirements
You will need to have achieved the CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply.

Module purpose
On completion of this module, learners will be able to evaluate the different schools of thought and the reasoning behind the variety of approaches to the management of themselves, individuals, and groups or teams within organisations, and how these might apply in a procurement and supply context.

Module aim(s)
Management is the administration of an organisation, whether it be a business, a not-for-profit organisation, or a government body. Management includes the activities of setting the strategy of an organisation and co-ordinating the efforts of its employees or volunteers to accomplish its objectives through the application of available resources, including financial, natural, technological, and human resources. In keeping with other organisational functions, those who manage procurement and supply activities must possess expertise in developing and fulfilling organisational and functional objectives, so learners will gain a wider appreciation of theories and techniques that relate to managing teams and individuals involved with the procurement and supply function.
target_audience: Senior buyers, contract and supply chain managers
Anyone advancing a career in procurement and supply.
Anyone in management roles or those managing or supervising the procurement and supply function who want to develop their career and work towards MCIPS Chartered Procurement and Supply Professional.
Students who have achieved CIPS Level 4 Diploma in Procurement and Supply.

This course provides a full scope overview of everything needed to start in the trucking industry as a CDL owner operator. You will learn how to start your business along with exploring the different CDL  equipment options. We also provide key tips and resources to operate profitably with load booking resources and proper business operation setup. This course is perfect for those looking to get an in depth understanding of the industry. Learn from our team and carriers who share their transparent knowledge and advice.
We are very passionate about the transportation industry, and are super excited to bring this course to you. It is our hope that we bring and share this wealth of knowledge, by empowering everyone to have access to the right information and tools. We hope this guide equips you to start your journey more informed. Our mission is to provide and equip those interested in the transportation industry with knowledge and resources to begin their business journey. Our transparent business services for owner-operators and small carrier companies allows for individualized consulting to start a successful trucking business.
So what you will learn. We will first begin with what it takes to start your business as a CDL owner operator. This topic explores all things required to set up your business to enter the transportation industry. Next we will dive into  CDL equipment options. This topic will explore the different options for CDL ventures in detail and even have real carrier knowledge to expand on what some routes can offer. We also cover the business profitability through a guide of how to book and find loads. Finally, we will wrap up with the business basics, making sure you are equipped with basic business knowledge to stay organized and operating profitable.
At the end of the course you will be better equipped to truly know and understand your options and how to get started in the transportation industry as a CDL owner operator.
Let's get started!

courses.title: Sustainability and Climate Risk (SCR) Certificate 2025
courses.bio: Ace Sustainability and Climate Risk (SCR GARP) Certification Exam
courses.description:
The SCR Certificate provides a holistic overview of the assessment and management of climate risk. Born from the growing demand across industries to incorporate sustainability standards into operations and business reporting, our cutting-edge Certificate Program symbolizes the urgency for organizations to address relevant issues driven by climate change. Passing the Exam and earning the Certificate demonstrates the knowledge and tools needed to assess and manage sustainability and climate risk challenges across many industries, putting SCR Certificate Holders, and the organizations that employ them, at a competitive advantage. The SCR Program also provides real-world insights into how today’s top companies are managing their climate risks. Our curriculum features incisive case studies from organizations including the World Wildlife Fund, ING, McKinsey & Co., Citi, HSBC, Kellogg, L’Oreal, and many others. To enhance the practical learning experience, candidates can access our new SCR Climate PAL, which features application based approaches to understanding GHG reporting, physical risk prioritization, and risk cross dependencies. Our SCR Climate PAL collaborators include PersefoniPro, and XDI.




The SCR Certificate Program is developed under the guidance of GARP’s SCR Advisory Committee, which is comprised of prominent global industry leaders across sustainability, ESG, and climate risk management.


The SCR Exam is a comprehensive assessment that covers the fundamental guidelines, methodologies, and frameworks organizations use to anticipate and manage climate risk. The Exam consists of 80 equally weighted, multiple-choice questions. The majority of Exam questions stand alone, with the exception of one multi-part question case study accompanied by four-to-six multi-part questions. Candidates are allotted four hours to complete the Exam
target_audience: Professionals enrolled in SCR Certification from GARP
Anyone who would like to deep dive in Sustainability and Climate Change or someone with the goal of clearing GARP SCR exam.

courses.title: How To Set Wellbeing As A Business Goal
courses.bio: Strategies To Manage Stress, Build Resilience, Improve Mental Focus And Integrate Wellbeing In Your Business
objectives: Integrate wellbeing in your day, no matter how many different stakeholders you have.
Spot burnout in yourself and others.
Set wellbeing as an intrinsic business goal across your team.
Adopt practical tools for short, medium and long-term goals and how to embed them in your working day.

2. Lecture 2: Part 1: Setting Wellbeing As A Business Goal
Part 3: How To Change Our Neural Pathways
6. Making It Stick: Positive Habits For Living A Purposeful Life
7. Inner Strength And Power: Build Your Inner Strength And Confidence With Stakeholders

requirements: No specific requirements.
courses.description:
Are you an HR manager who feels frustrated, tired or stressed out? Do you often feel stuck between C-suite decisions and the organisation's needs? Has your budget been cut yet you're still asked to deliver the same results? If any of these resonate with you then this course is designed to help!
With the recent pandemic, global wars and climate change, the world has become an uncertain place. As an HR professional, you may have found yourself ‘firefighting’ during COVID-19 and then adjusting to hybrid work and budget cuts, which may have taken a toll on your wellbeing and that of your HR team. In addition, the incredible pace of human civilisation has far outrun nature’s ability to update the design of our brains to help us cope with it. We are bombarded by information and mentally drained by constant demands on our energy and time. If we want to be healthy, we must take time to honour one of the body’s most fragile organs - the brain, the heart and the gut. To do this, we need to integrate wellbeing into our workday.
Based on the latest research with Softer Success and King's College London, it has become evident that when leaders, CEOs and HR teams set wellbeing as a business goal it can help prevent burnout, enhance wellbeing and improve cognition. Wellbeing can be thought of as 'being well' but what does that really mean? And how do you integrate wellbeing as a business goal in your HR role, so that you can be healthy and sustainably productive, and help others around you be the same?
The course is designed to help you manage stress, overwhelm and worry with a three-step strategy to prevent burnout, focusing on holistic health. Over a series of video-based lectures, you will learn how to integrate wellbeing into your daily work and your team's work. You will identify daily practices that can kickstart long-term positive habits and even alter neural pathways in the brain. We will equip you with practical tools to help you implement short-, medium- and long-term wellbeing goals and you will become more aware of the risks that contribute to burnout with a scientifically backed 90-second wellbeing assessment. Once you know how to define new metrics of success, you can make mental connections between the success of the business and your wellbeing as its most precious resource. Each individual is different and the triggers for the compulsive behaviour that may lead to burnout can be highly individual. Here, you will learn how to 'burnout-proof' your job, no matter how many stakeholders are in your life, and understand how to do this with your teams.
This course will equip you with easy-to-use tools for managing stress, finding more balance and improving your mental focus. You will learn several strategies to increase your confidence and inner strength when dealing with multiple stakeholders. Here, we will ensure that wellbeing is embedded in your work and systems!
So, are you ready to do your job with ease and effortlessness? To influence and show others to do the same? To have the right energy and easily bounce back from any challenge that comes your way? Then enrol now to learn more.
target_audience: HR Managers who want to learn how to balance their work while helping others.
Chief People and Culture Officers wanting to learn more about culture change and future ways of working.
HR Operations specialists who strive to put people first but are often dealing with multiple stakeholders with different agendas.
Heads of Talent, Talent Specialists and Benefit Specialists who want to reach a wider audience and attract greater talent by becoming more aware and being able to set their own wellbeing goals.
Any HR professional who wants to feel more energised, balanced and happier in their role.

objectives: Defining Customer Due Diligence (CDD): Understand the fundamentals of CDD and its importance in anti-money laundering and compliance through real-world examples

requirements: No prior knoweldge needed
courses.description:
This comprehensive course on Customer Due Diligence (CDD) is meticulously designed to equip professionals with the critical knowledge and skills needed to effectively prevent money laundering and ensure compliance with stringent regulatory standards. The course provides an in-depth understanding of the key components of CDD, including the handling of politically exposed persons (PEPs), identification of beneficial owners, and thorough transaction monitoring.
Participants will gain a deep comprehension of the complexities involved in each aspect of CDD, with practical insights and strategies that can be applied in real-world scenarios. The course covers the legal and regulatory frameworks that govern CDD practices, emphasizing the importance of effective risk assessment processes. Participants will learn how to detect and respond to suspicious activities, ensuring their organizations remain compliant and secure.
Additionally, the course addresses the unique challenges and best practices associated with managing PEPs, enabling participants to navigate this critical area with confidence. The training also includes practical exercises and case studies to reinforce learning and provide hands-on experience.
By the end of the course, professionals will be equipped with the expertise to establish and maintain robust CDD processes within their organizations. This will help safeguard against financial crimes and uphold the integrity of their institutions. This training is invaluable for compliance officers, risk management professionals, financial institution employees, and anyone involved in customer onboarding and due diligence activities, ensuring they are well-prepared to meet regulatory demands and protect their organizations from potential risks.
target_audience: Compliance Professionals and Officers: For those ensuring regulatory compliance in customer due diligence and anti-money laundering.
Risk Management Professionals: Focused on mitigating risks in customer onboarding and transactions.
Financial Institution Employees: For those involved in customer due diligence and compliance activities in banks, credit unions, and insurance companies.
Client Onboarding Executives: For professionals managing customer access and understanding compliance aspects.
Students Planning a Career in Compliance: Provides a solid foundation in customer due diligence and anti-money laundering practices.

About this topic...
Fundraising is a collective effort that, when approached effectively, involves every member of a nonprofit's staff contributing to achieving financial sustainability. By integrating fundraising into daily activities, staff can create a cohesive and unified message that maximizes outreach and engagement. Understanding and developing fundraising skills are essential for all nonprofit team members, as it empowers them to contribute meaningfully to the organization's success, fosters a culture of collaboration and accountability, and ensures the long-term financial stability needed to advance the nonprofit's mission.
Who is this course for?
Nonprofit staff who are in, or work closely with, the development department will benefit from this fresh take on resource generation. Those who support or are interested in getting into fundraising will also enjoy this exploration of how to take action to get the funds and resources necessary for your nonprofit to be successful!
This course explores the following Korn Ferry competencies:
Action Orientation
Courage
Interpersonal Savvy
Persuasion
Instilling Trust
What You Will Learn
The unique duties of staff in organizing and operationalizing nonprofit resource generation, and ensuring continuity across the seasons of a nonprofit's lifecycle.
Five means of managing nonprofit fundraising initiatives and activities, and four means of leading toward a culture of philanthropy.
Tangible and intangible resources that can be pursued to support your mission.
How staff "clusters" can activate their fundraising abilities in different strategic ways.
Ways to define nonprofit fundraising and resource generation in terms of both success and performance.
The differences between "information" and "input" in the context of fundraising data.
Quantitatively and qualitatively measuring nonprofit fundraising abilities and effectiveness in your organization.
How to gather both historical and current capacity data to understand our nonprofit team's fundraising abilities.
Setting nonprofit fundraising improvement goals that stand on the five key skills of revenue-generation.
The positives (and potential negatives) of the "flywheel effect" on our fundraising practices.
target_audience: Nonprofit staff who are in, or work closely, with the development department will benefit from this fresh take on resource generation.

courses.title: 【575時間で合格ライン！】中小企業診断士試験　独学短期合格メソッド
courses.bio: 予備校不要！短期間で独学合格した私のノウハウを全てお伝えします。今から学習を始めても今年度試験に間に合います！
objectives: 中小企業診断士試験の最新状況
独学＆短期合格法
試験合格までの所要時間
二次試験の解答具体例

なぜ今中小企業診断士なのか: 中小企業経営者の高齢化と事業承継
コロナ禍での中小企業支援の必要性
地方におけるビジネスリーダー不足
2次試験勉強法: 自分のやり方を信じる
平成26年度2次論述試験解答導出例: 平成26年度2次試験論述試験解答導出例
追加講座：1次試験の学習の具体的な進め方: 1次試験対策を具体的なプランに落とし込む

requirements: どなたでもご受講いただけます
courses.description:
この講座では独学かつ短期間で中小企業診断士試験に合格する方法論をお伝えします。


中小企業診断士という資格をご存じでしょうか。
「国が認めた唯一の経営コンサルタント」資格と言われ、日経新聞の調査によると取得したいビジネス関連資格で1位となった、今ビジネスマンを中心に注目を集めている資格です（2016年1月12日 日本経済新聞）。
この試験は1次試験（択一式）、2次試験（記述式）、口述試験と3つの関門を潜り抜ける必要があります。
合格率も1次試験20%・2次試験20%が過去の平均値で単純計算した最終合格率は4%（20%×20%）という難関資格の一つと言われています。
※ここ数年その傾向は変化しています。講座の中ではその理由について、中小企業診断士資格の位置づけの変化とともに解説していきます。


1次試験では
・経済学経済政策
・財務会計
・企業経営理論
・運営管理
・経営法務
・経営情報システム
・中小企業経営政策
の7科目をすべて合格しなければならず、それぞれの科目ごとに幅広い知識が必要とされます。


さらに1次試験合格者だけが受験できる2次試験では、
・事例Ⅰ：組織、人事
・事例Ⅱ：マーケティング、流通
・事例Ⅲ：生産、技術
・事例Ⅳ：財務、会計
の4領域について論述式での試験が課されます。


その後、論述式試験合格者を対象に口述試験があり、その合格者が最終合格者として官報に記載されます。


ここまで読んで頂いて勉強量の膨大さに頭がクラクラされた方がいらっしゃるのではないでしょうか。
実際、1次2次全ての標準的なテキスト・模擬問題・過去問集等を積み上げると１ｍくらいになったりもします。
「興味はあるけど、自分には到底無理そうだな」
「予備校に通う時間もお金もないよ」


そう思われた方、大丈夫です。
中小企業診断士試験は「一定期間正しい努力を継続できれば」働きながら独学で合格できます。
ある程度まとまった時間を受験勉強に集中する必要はありますが、幸いなことにこれらの勉強は知的好奇心旺盛なビジネスマンにとって刺激的で楽しい体験になるでしょう。
勉強したことが日常業務に直結するという副次的な効果もあり、受験勉強にありがちなひたすら無機質に知識を詰め込むといった苦痛からは縁遠いものです。
この講座では、短期間で独学合格した私のノウハウ（使ったテキスト、参考書、問題への取り組み方）をお伝えし、悩める独学者に合格までのルートを示すことができればと考えております。


「自分のやり方は正しいのだろうか」と悩んでいろんな市販教材に手を出し続ける日々はもう卒業しましょう。
自分のスタイルを確立し、迷わずにすべてのリソースを集中投入することが短期合格へのカギとなります。


迷いを捨て、目標達成へ向けた効率的な努力を継続することが合格への近道です。


＜講座の内容＞
■中小企業診断士とは何か
資格の位置づけ
取得のメリット
■なぜ今中小企業診断士なのか
1次試験合格率が急上昇中
社会的ニーズの変化
中小企業経営者の高齢化と事業承継
コロナ禍での中小企業支援の必要性
地方におけるビジネスリーダー不足
■学習計画
心構え
必要な時間は575時間
■1次試験の勉強法
おすすめ教材
全体把握編
過去問への取り組み方
重要科目テコ入れ
■2次試験の勉強法
所要時間は213時間
2次試験独学は自己採点が肝
事例１～３までの勉強法
事例４の勉強法
口述試験対策
■二次試験解答例と解き方イメージ（私の実例）
target_audience: 中小企業診断士受験者もしくは受験を検討している方

courses.title: Environmental, Health and Safety KPI’s
courses.bio: EHS Performance Indicators
objectives: Most common Environmental KPI’s
Most common Occupational Health KPI’s
Most common Safety KPI’s
Difference between KPI and KAI
requirements: EHS experience
courses.description:
In this course you will learn the main performance indicators of the EHS department; Environmental, Energy, Occupational Health and safety.
It is important to mention that each company / organization decides which are the appropriate KPIs for their processes and departments, so the indicators mentioned here can be taken as a suggestion to implement in your workplace.
You will see the difference between KPIs and KAIs, and which indicators of all those mentioned, fit into which category. Not only will the main indicators, or the most common, be mentioned, but also examples of how they will serve you in your workplace, and best practices that you can implement to facilitate their measurement and ensure that the data collected is correct.
Each department has its own KPIs, for example in the quality department, in production, in logistics, costs, etc. So EHS should not be left behind. EHS must be able to measure its own performance. Remember that what is not measured, cannot be improved.
It can be said that some of the indicators mentioned in the course can also be considered sustainability indicators, if your company measures them.
I hope you find this course very useful! And if in the end you are left with questions, do not hesitate to contact me.
;)


DISCLAIMER: English (US) is not my first language, I did this course in english because I guess there must be someone looking for information like this and it may be useful. If you do not understand something because of my accent, please write to me and I will answer as soon and clear as possible.

courses.title: Thrive After Redundancy: A Positive Career Opportunity
courses.bio: Transform job loss into a new beginning with proven strategies for resilience, direction, and renewed career success.
objectives: Reframe redundancy as a positive career turning point
Identify new goals, strengths, and opportunities
Manage emotions and stay resilient under pressure
Build momentum and take action on your next steps
requirements: No prior experience needed-just a willingness to reflect and take action.
courses.description:
Facing redundancy can be a life-altering moment. It’s easy to feel overwhelmed, uncertain, and stuck—but what if this setback could actually be a setup for something better?
Welcome to Thrive After Redundancy: A Positive Career Opportunity, a practical, empowering course designed to help you take back control of your future.
I’m Zara, a seasoned global HR professional who’s helped dozens of people navigate the complex emotions and logistics of redundancy. I’ve sat in on countless severance interviews—and I’ve also witnessed what happens when people use that turning point to launch something far greater.
In this course, you’ll learn how to shift your mindset from fear to opportunity. We’ll explore real-life strategies that help you manage the emotional rollercoaster, stay grounded, and make confident decisions. You’ll gain clarity on your next move—whether that’s finding a new job, exploring self-employment, or pausing to redefine what success really means to you.
We’ll cover:
The psychology of redundancy and how to process it
How to assess your skills and define new career paths
Building a support system and professional network
Practical tips for job searching, interviewing, and negotiating post-redundancy
This isn’t about false positivity—it’s about equipping you with the tools to transform uncertainty into a career you actively choose.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the mindset and strategy to face the future with confidence, resilience, and purpose.
Redundancy isn’t the end. It might just be your best beginning.
Join me, and let’s find out what’s next—together.
target_audience: Anyone facing redundancy or career transition who wants to move forward with purpose.

courses.title: Food Design, what it is and who does it.
courses.bio: An introduction to the Food Design discipline
requirements: No previous knowledge or skills required!
courses.description:
This course answers the question: What is Food Design?
This course will show you it is more thank you think it is! Promised.
Food Design is a vast discipline that in one sense is about 23-25 years old, since the moment when it seems the term Food Design was first coined, but in another sense this discipline is as old as human beings, because the first time we put a piece of meat on a fire we were applying innovation to food, so we were food design-ing. After that we have continued applying our creative abilities to food, and today we enjoy extremely refined dishes that result from hundreds of cooking techniques, we eat in space in zero gravity, we have functional food, we are able to preserve food’s properties for decades, etc. We have also applied innovation to everything that is outside of our plate but directly correlated to it: production, procurement, transportation, transformation, distribution, presentation, consumption, and disposal. Therefore, Food Design propositions are more than food, but are applied to any point in the food chain. These innovations would not be possible without available research on psychology, engineering, material production, sociology, sustainability, biology, chemistry, architecture, all of the Design disciplines, etc. Food Design is a discipline that does not stand on its own but is intimately intertwined with all other disciplines of human knowledge.
Find all my Food Design books here: francescazampollo dot com/books
target_audience: Anyone who is curious to understand what Food Design is and what it can do

courses.title: Mistake Proofing (Poka-Yoke) Specialist Simulation Exam
courses.bio: Prepare for Certified Mistake Proofing Specialist Certification Exam | Solve 200 Realistic Simulation Exam Questions
courses.description:
Want to become a Certified Mistake Proofing Specialist?
If yes, you’ve come to the right place.
This Mistake Proofing Specialist Simulation Exam is your final preparation checkpoint before attempting the official AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Specialist Certification Exam. With 200 multiple choice questions spread across two intensive practice tests (100 + 100 questions), this simulation provides a realistic, exam-like experience that mirrors the actual certification environment.
Whether you’re aiming to lead root cause investigations, drive sustainable corrective actions in service environments, or master structured problem-solving techniques—this simulation exam gives you the confidence and clarity you need.
Who Should Take This Simulation Exam?
This simulation is designed specifically for:
Individuals who have completed the AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Specialist (Accredited) Training
Professionals preparing for the AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Specialist Certification Exam
Service industry leaders involved in process improvement, quality, or problem resolution
Anyone looking to validate and refine their Mistake Proofing skills through real-world scenarios
What’s Included?
200 real-world simulation questions
Two full-length practice tests: 100 + 100 questions
Questions aligned to the latest AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Body of Knowledge
Varied formats to assess your theoretical understanding an d practical decision-making
Unlimited retakes – practice as often as needed
Review filters: correct, incorrect, skipped, and marked for review
Instant scoring to help benchmark your performance and progress
What Topics Are Covered?
The simulation questions cover all core elements of your 8D Problem Solving (Accredited) Training, including:
Introduction to Mistake Proofing in the Service Industry
Understanding Errors In Service Processes
Five Levels Of Mistake Proofing For Service Processes
Mistake Proofing Strategies For Service Industries
Step-By-Step Process Of Implementing And Measuring Mistake Proofing Success
Real-World Execution of Poka-Yoke in Services
Using AI to Drive Mistake-Proofing in Real-World Service Projects
How to Use This Simulation Effectively?
Complete each test in a single sitting to simulate real exam conditions
The official certification exam has no time limit but must be completed in one uninterrupted session
You must consistently score 60% or higher on both tests before attempting the actual certification
Analyze incorrect answers to identify knowledge gaps—then revisit your video lectures and notes
Repeat the practice tests to build endurance, accuracy, and exam confidence
Why This Simulation Exam Matters?
This is more than just a certification checkpoint—it’s your proving ground for becoming a frontline defense against process errors and service failures. Every question is designed to test your ability to:
Apply mistake-proofing (Poka-Yoke) strategies in real-world service industry scenarios
Anticipate, identify, and eliminate potential sources of human or system error
Design simple, effective solutions that prevent defects before they happen
Strengthen operational resilience by minimizing rework, waste, and customer dissatisfaction
Lead teams to build error-resistant processes that enhance quality and reliability
Whether you’re optimizing a patient intake process, an e-commerce workflow, or a hotel check-in system—this exam ensures you’re ready to deliver error-free service with confidence.
Are You Ready?
This simulation exam is the ultimate preparation tool to help you earn your AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Specialist Certification. Take the leap, validate your expertise, and lead your organization with confidence and skill.
Click "Buy Now" or "Add to Cart" to begin your certification journey today!
target_audience: Professionals preparing for the AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Specialist Certification who want to apply Poka-Yoke concepts confidently in real-world scenarios
Service industry managers, quality assurance specialists, and operations professionals aiming to eliminate process defects and enhance customer experience
Individuals who have completed the AIGPE™ Mistake Proofing Specialist (Accredited) Training and are ready to formalize their learning with certification
Anyone involved in continuous improvement, Lean, or Six Sigma projects seeking to integrate practical error-proofing techniques into their work
Learners who want a structured, hands-on understanding of mistake proofing strategies across cross-functional teams and service-driven environments

courses.title: PCI DSS Implementation Advanced Guide
courses.bio: An A-to-Z PCI DSS implementation guide for implementers: real-world insights, planning, tech stack, and audit readiness.
objectives: Understand and apply the 12 core PCI DSS requirements across documentation, technology, and implementation.
Develop and manage a full PCI DSS compliance program, including scoping, pre-assessment planning, and post-assessment maintenance.
Evaluate and select appropriate technologies and tools to build and secure a PCI DSS-compliant Cardholder Data Environment (CDE).
Confidently prepare for and engage with Qualified Security Assessors (QSAs), supporting audits with structured evidence and clear documentation.
requirements: No prior PCI DSS knowledge is required. Basic understanding of IT systems, networks, or compliance frameworks is helpful but not mandatory. You will be guided from foundational concepts to full implementation.
courses.description:
Welcome to the PCI DSS Implementation Advanced Guide — a comprehensive course designed for implementers, consultants, and security professionals ready to take full control of the PCI DSS journey.
This course is not about theory. It’s built from the ground up based on real-world experience, hands-on implementation projects, and field-tested strategies used in organizations ranging from startups to enterprise-level infrastructures. Whether you're leading your organization's compliance effort or supporting others as a consultant, this training provides a full, actionable roadmap.
You’ll gain in-depth understanding of:
The PCI DSS standard, its evolution, and how to read it like a professional.
How to decide your compliance strategy: defined, customized, or compensating approach.
Core security technologies required to secure the Cardholder Data Environment (CDE).
Documenting controls, planning assessments, and preparing for audits.
Managing vulnerability scans and penetration testing.
Understanding QSA processes, SAQs, AOCs, ROCs, and continuous compliance cycles.
We cover everything from planning to post-audit management, enriched with tools, templates, and technology stacks. You’ll also explore advanced concepts like PDCA for learning, correct reading methodology, and building internal capabilities to keep compliance sustainable.
By the end, you’ll walk away equipped to lead your own PCI DSS implementation — confident, knowledgeable, and ready to prove compliance.
target_audience: This course is for IT professionals, security officers, compliance managers, and anyone responsible for implementing or supporting PCI DSS in their organization. It’s especially helpful for those tasked with getting PCI compliant—whether starting from scratch or refining existing processes.

courses.title: CIPS L5M2 Advanced Diploma - Managing Supply Chain Risk
courses.bio: 2025 updated syllabus, practice questions and helpful explanations will help you prepare for your CIPS exam.
courses.description:
Welcome to CIPS Level 5 Advanced Diploma in Procurement and Supply - L5M2 Managing Supply Chain Risk

What will I learn?
Prepare and revise for your upcoming CIPS exam using our practice questions, designed to mirror actual questions asked in CIPS exams to help you succeed in your studies.
After each practice test, you'll receive an instant score, giving you a clear idea of your potential to pass the actual exam and feedback on areas to revise. Each question comes with a detailed explanation of the correct response, and insights into common exam themes and tips on how to handle different types of quiz questions and CIPS command words to look out for.
Using our practice tests will help you not only not only succeed in your CIPS exams but also deepen your understanding of the course material.
Our goal is to ensure you have both the skills to succeed in your CIPS exams and the practical insights to excel in your career as a procurement professional.

courses.description:
Course Description:
Are you passionate about African folktales and storytelling? Do you dream of creating a YouTube channel that brings these timeless stories to life while building a loyal audience and earning income?
This course is your ultimate guide to YouTube channel creation and growth, specifically tailored for African folktales and storytelling enthusiasts. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your strategy, you'll learn step-by-step how to create, manage, and grow a successful YouTube channel dedicated to sharing the rich heritage of African folklore.
What You'll Learn:
Story Selection and Crafting: How to choose and narrate captivating folktales that resonate with diverse audiences.
Channel Creation Essentials: Setting up a professional YouTube channel, optimizing it for maximum visibility, and branding it for success.
Video Creation Techniques: Tools and tips for creating engaging videos, including scripting, voiceovers, visuals, and editing.
Audience Growth Strategies: Proven methods to attract, engage, and retain subscribers through storytelling and community building.
Monetization and Income Streams: How to generate revenue from your channel through ads, sponsorships, merchandise, and more.
Analytics and Optimization: Learn how to track your channel's performance and make data-driven decisions for consistent growth.
Why Take This Course?
African folktales are a treasure trove of wisdom and entertainment, yet they remain an underrepresented niche on YouTube. By joining this course, you'll not only preserve and share these stories but also tap into a growing global audience hungry for unique and meaningful content.
Whether you're looking to share your culture, teach life lessons through storytelling, or build a profitable YouTube channel, this course equips you with everything you need to succeed.
Who Is This Course For?
Aspiring YouTubers passionate about African folklore.
Storytellers who want to digitize their craft.
Creators looking for a niche with high growth potential.
Anyone eager to share and monetize unique cultural stories.
Start your journey today and transform your passion for African folktales into a thriving YouTube channel that entertains, educates, and inspires!
target_audience: Anyone interested in leveraging the power of YouTube and social media to build an audience.
People interested in monetizing their storytelling skills and turning it into a profitable venture.
Individuals with little to no experience in video production or YouTube who need step-by-step guidance.
People passionate about storytelling who want to share African folklore with a global audience.
Individuals looking to start a unique and engaging YouTube channel centered on African folktales.
Those who wish to preserve and promote African traditions, culture, and moral lessons through folktales.
Professionals looking to use African folktales as educational tools to teach life lessons and cultural awareness.
